S06bsu049_u:392: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kena kāraṇena āyuṣman subhūte tatrāpi citte asakto 'paryāpannaḥ?
S06bsu049_u:393: subhūtirāha - acittatvādāyuṣman śāriputra tatrāpi citte asakto 'paryāpannaḥ //
S06bsu049_u:394: śāriputra āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte asti taccittaṃ yaccittamacittam?
S06bsu049_u:395: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra tatra acittatāyāmastitā vā nāstitā vā vidyate vā upalabhyate vā?
S06bsu049_u:397: subhūtirāha - tadyadi āyuṣman śāriputra tatra acittatāyāmastitā vā nāstitā vā na vidyate vā nopalabhyate vā,
S06bsu049_u:398: tatkathamāyuṣmān śāriputra evamāha - asti taccittaṃ yaccittamacittamiti?
S06bsu049_u:399: śāriputra āha - sādhu sādhu āyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:400: yathāpi nāma tvaṃ bhagavatā araṇāvihāriṇāmagratāyāṃ nirdiṣṭo nirdiśasi //
S06bsu049_u:401: atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputro bhagavantametadavocat - mahāsattvo mahāsattva iti yadidaṃ bhagavannucyate,
S06bsu049_u:404: tasmātsa mahāsattvo mahāsattva iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati //
S06bsu049_u:405: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddho mahāyānasaṃnaddha iti yadidaṃ bhagavannucyate,
S06bsu049_u:406: kiyatā bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddho bhavati ?
S06bsu049_u:407: bhagavānāha - iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhavati - aprameyā mayā sattvāḥ parinirvāpayitavyā iti /
S06bsu049_u:409: na ca te santi yairye parinirvāpayitavyā iti /
S06bsu049_u:411: na ca sa kaścitsattvo yaḥ parinirvṛto yena ca parinirvāpito bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:414: yathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākaro vā māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahāntaṃ janakāyamabhinirmimīte /
S06bsu049_u:416: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu tatra kenacitkaściddhato vā mṛto vā nāśito vā antarhito vā?
S06bsu049_u:418: bhagavānāha - evameva subhūte bodhisattvo [Vaidya_11] mahāsattvo 'prameyānasaṃkhyeyān sattvān parinirvāpayati /
S06bsu049_u:419: na ca sa kaścitsattvo yaḥ parinirvṛto yena ca parinirvāpito bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:420: sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ nirdeśamevaṃ nirdiśyamānaṃ śrutvā notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:421: iyatā ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddho veditavyaḥ //
S06bsu049_u:422: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi,
S06bsu049_u:423: tathā asaṃnāhasaṃnaddho batāyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:427: akṛtā hi subhūte sarvajñatā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtā /
S06bsu049_u:439: atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - rūpamāyuṣman subhūte abaddhamamuktamiti vadasi /
S06bsu049_u:442: rūpatathatāpi āyuṣman subhūte abaddhā amukteti vadasi /

S06bsu049_u:450: katamā sā āyuṣman subhūte rūpatathatā yā rūpatathatāpyabaddhā amukteti vadasi?
S06bsu049_u:451: evaṃ katamā sā vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā?
S06bsu049_u:452: katamā sā āyuṣman subhūte vijñānatathatā yā vijñānatathatāpyabaddhā amukteti vadasi?
S06bsu049_u:453: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ pūrṇaṃ maitrāyaṇīputrametadavocat - yadāyuṣman pūrṇa māyāpuruṣasya rūpaṃ tadabaddhamamuktam /
S06bsu049_u:458: yā āyuṣman pūrṇa māyāpuruṣasya rūpatathatā sā abaddhā amuktā /
S06bsu049_u:459: evaṃ yā māyāpuruṣasya vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā /
S06bsu049_u:460: yā āyuṣman pūrṇa māyāpuruṣasya vijñānatathatā sā abaddhā amuktā /
S06bsu049_u:465: ayaṃ sa bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya mahāyānasaṃprasthitasya mahāyānasamārūḍhasya mahāsaṃnāho 'saṃnāhaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:467: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - evaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo [Vaidya_12] mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhaḥ san mahāyānasaṃprasthito mahāyānasamārūḍho bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:474: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - mahāyānamiti subhūte aprameyatāyā etadadhivacanam /

S06bsu049_u:490: nāpi kaścittena mahāyānena niryāto nāpi niryāsyati nāpi niryāti /
S06bsu049_u:495: evamavidyamāneṣu sarvadharmeṣu katamo dharmaḥ katamena dharmeṇa niryāsyati?
S06bsu049_u:496: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasaṃnaddho mahāyānasaṃprasthito mahāyānasamārūḍho bhavati //
S06bsu049_u:497: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - mahāyānaṃ mahāyānamiti bhagavannucyate /
S06bsu049_u:500: evameva bhagavan asmin yāne aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmavakāśaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:501: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa mahāyānamidaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām /
S06bsu049_u:505: evamasya bhagavan mahāyānasya naiva pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06bsu049_u:510: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:515: atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputro bhagavantametadavocat - ayaṃ bhagavan subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kṛtaśo 'dhīṣṭo mahāyānamupadeṣṭavyaṃ manyate /
S06bsu049_u:516: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - nāhaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ vyatikramya mahāyānamavocam /
S06bsu049_u:520: api nu khalu punarbhagavan pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06bsu049_u:532: evaṃ bhagavan sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ bodhisattvadharmamanupalabhamāno nāhaṃ bhagavan taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yasyaitannāmadheyaṃ yaduta bodhisattva iti /
S06bsu049_u:535: so 'haṃ bhagavan sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ taṃ dharmamanupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan katamaṃ dharmaṃ katamena dharmeṇa katamasmin dharme 'vavadiṣyāmi anuśāsiṣyāmi?
S06bsu049_u:549: na cānyatra bhagavan anabhinirvṛttitaḥ sarvadharmā vā buddhadharmā vā bodhisattvadharmā vā upalabhyante,
S06bsu049_u:551: sacedbhagavan evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe evaṃ deśyamāne evamupadiśyamāne bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na viṣīdati na viṣādamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:552: nāsya vipṛṣṭhībhavati mānasaṃ na bhagnapṛṣṭhībhavati notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:553: evaṃ veditavyam - caratyayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:558: yasmin hi samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ imān dharmān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vyupaparīkṣate,
S06bsu049_u:563: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān /

S06bsu049_u:575: evaṃ tathā hi yo vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu049_u:576: tathā hi yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tadvijñānam,
S06bsu049_u:582: evaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvākāraṃ sarvadharmān vyupaparīkṣamāṇaḥ tasmin samaye na rūpamupaiti,
S06bsu049_u:586: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān /
S06bsu049_u:592: tathā hi yo rūpasyānutpādo na tadrūpam /

S06bsu049_u:599: tathā hi yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tadvijñānam,
S06bsu049_u:605: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tena hi yathāhamāyuṣmataḥ subhūterbhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi,
S06bsu049_u:607: yadi ca āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo 'pyanutpādaḥ kiṃ bodhisattvo duṣkaracārikāṃ carati?
S06bsu049_u:608: yāni vā tāni sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo duḥkhānyutsahate pratyanubhavitum?
S06bsu049_u:609_0: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - nāhamāyuṣman śāriputra
S06bsu049_u:609_1: icchāmi bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ duṣkaracārikāṃ carantam nāpi sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
S06bsu049_u:611: na hi āyuṣman śāriputra duṣkarasaṃjñāṃ janayitvā śakyo 'prameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmarthaḥ kartum /
S06bsu049_u:613: sarvasattvānāmantike mātṛsaṃjñāṃ pitṛsaṃjñāṃ putrasaṃjñāṃ duhitṛsaṃjñāṃ kṛtvā strīpuruṣeṣu /
S06bsu049_u:614: evametāḥ saṃjñāḥ kṛtvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvacārikāṃ carati /
S06bsu049_u:615: tasmānmātṛsaṃjñā pitṛsaṃjñā putrasaṃjñā duhitṛsaṃjñā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvānāmantike yāvadātmasaṃjñā utpādayitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:616: yathā ātmā sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvaduḥkhebhyo mocayitavyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:617: evaṃ sarvasattvāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvaduḥkhebhyo mocayitavyā iti /
S06bsu049_u:618: evaṃ ca sarvasattveṣu saṃjñā utpādayitavyā - mayaite sarvasattvā na parityaktavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:620: na ca mayaiteṣu cittapradoṣa utpādayitavya antaśaḥ śataśo 'pi chidyamāneneti /
S06bsu049_u:621: evaṃ hi bodhisattvena mahāsattvena cittamutpādayitavyam sacedevaṃcitto vihariṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:624: punaraparamāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - yathā sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvamātmā na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06bsu049_u:625: evaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvadharmā na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante /
S06bsu049_u:630: yadapyāyuṣman śāriputra evamāha - anutpādo bodhisattvo iti /
S06bsu049_u:633: śāriputra āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattva evānutpādaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:635: subhūtirāha - bodhisattvadharmā api āyuṣman śāriputra anutpādaḥ śāriputra āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvadharmā evānutpādaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:641: āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte sarvajñatādharmā evānutpādaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:644: āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte pṛthagjana evānutpādaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:647: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - yadyāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo 'pyanutpādaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:653: nanvāyuṣman subhūte anuprāptaiva ayatnena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvajñatā bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:654: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - nāhamāyuṣman śāriputra anutpannasya dharmasya prāptimicchāmi,
S06bsu049_u:657: āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte anutpannena dharmeṇa anutpannā prāptiḥ prāpyate,
S06bsu049_u:658: utāho utpannena dharmeṇa anutpannā prāptiḥ prāpyate?
S06bsu049_u:659: āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anutpanno dharma utpannaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:661: āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte utpāda eva dharmo 'nutpādaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:663: āha - utpādo dharmo 'nutpādo dharma ityāyuṣman śāriputra na pratibhāti jalpitum /
S06bsu049_u:664: āha - anutpādo 'pi te āyuṣman subhūte pratibhāti jalpitum /
S06bsu049_u:669: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - dhārmakathikānāmāyuṣmān subhūtiragratāyāṃ sthāpitavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:671: tathā hyāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviro yato yata eva paripraśnīkriyate,
S06bsu049_u:675: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - dharmataiṣā āyuṣman śāriputra bhagavataḥ śrāvakāṇāmaniśritadharmāṇām /
S06bsu049_u:682: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sādhu sādhu āyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:686: iti hi yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāmevaṃ deśyamānāyāmevamupadiśyamānāyāṃ na bhavati cittasya avalīnatvam,
S06bsu049_u:690: veditavyamayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viharatyanena prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa avirahitaścānena manasikāreṇeti // [Vaidya_16]
S06bsu049_u:691: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmataṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kathamāyuṣman subhūte avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'virahito manasikāreṇa bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:693: yadi hyāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'virahito manasikāreṇa bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:695: yadi ca āyuṣman subhūte avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:697: yadi ca āyuṣman subhūte manasikāreṇāvirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:699: evaṃ sati sarvasattvā apyavirahitā bhaviṣyanti prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa /
S06bsu049_u:702: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - sādhu sādhu āyuṣman śāriputra /
S06bsu049_u:704: artha eva tvāyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa bhūtapadābhidhānena parigṛhītaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:712: anena āyuṣman śāriputra evaṃrūpeṇa manasikāreṇa icchāmi bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ viharantamanena vihāreṇeti //
S06bsu049_u:717: tena khalu punaḥ samayena śakro devānāmindrastasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatitaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇo 'bhūt catvāriṃśatā trāyastriṃśatkāyikairdevaputrasahasraiḥ sārdham /
S06bsu049_u:718: catvāraś ca lokapālā viṃśatyā cāturmahārājakāyikairdevaputrasahasraiḥ sārdham /
S06bsu049_u:720: pañca ca śuddhāvāsānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi tasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatitāni saṃniṣaṇṇānyabhūvan /
S06bsu049_u:723_0: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocat - imānyārya
S06bsu049_u:723_1: subhūte saṃbahulāni devaputrasahasrāṇi asyāṃ parṣadi saṃnipatitāni saṃniṣaṇṇāni āryasya
S06bsu049_u:727: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - tena hi kauśika upadekṣyāmi te buddhānubhāvena buddhatejasā buddhādhiṣṭhānena /
S06bsu049_u:731: na te bhavyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayitum /
S06bsu049_u:734: abhavyā hi te punaḥ punaḥ saṃsaraṇāya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayitum /
S06bsu049_u:738: viśiṣṭebhyo hi dharmebhyo viśiṣṭatamā dharmā adhyālambitavyāḥ //
S06bsu049_u:739: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimāmantrayate sma - sādhu sādhu subhūte,
S06bsu049_u:742: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kṛtajñairasmābhirbhagavan bhagavato bhavitavyaṃ nākṛtajñaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:744: paurvakāṇāṃ hi bhagavaṃstathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantike 'smadarthe bhagavān yathā brahmacaryaṃ bodhāya caran pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūta eva san,
S06bsu049_u:747: evaṃ bhagavan asmābhir api bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuparigrahītavyā anuparivārayitavyāśca,
S06bsu049_u:750: asmābhir api hi bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuparigṛhītā anuparivāritāśca,
S06bsu049_u:752: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindramāmantrayate sma - tena hi kauśika śṛṇu,
S06bsu049_u:753: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru,
S06bsu049_u:754: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te yathā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam /

S06bsu049_u:758: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu /
S06bsu049_u:825: srotaāpannāḥ saptakṛto bhavaparamā iti na sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:827: sakṛdāgāmyapariniṣṭhitattvātsakṛdimaṃ lokamāgamya duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyatīti na sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:828: anāgāmī dakṣiṇīya iti na sthātavyam anāgāmī anāgamya imaṃ lokaṃ tatraiva parinirvāsyatīti na sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:830: arhannihaiva anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyatīti na sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:832: pratyekabuddho 'tikramya śrāvakabhūmimaprāpya buddhabhūmiṃ parinirvāsyatīti na sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:834_3: buddhabhūmau sthitvā buddhakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau buddhaparinirvāṇena
S06bsu049_u:835_0: atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitadabhavat - yadi buddho 'tikramya pṛthagjanabhūmimatikramya
S06bsu049_u:835_4: buddhakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau buddhaparinirvāṇena parinirvāsyati
S06bsu049_u:838_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya
S06bsu049_u:838_1: āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase āyuṣman śāriputra kva tathāgato
S06bsu049_u:839: āyuṣmān śāriputra āha - na kvacidāyuṣman subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sthitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:842: sa naiva saṃskṛte dhātau sthito nāpyasaṃskṛte dhātau sthito na ca tato vyutthitaḥ //
S06bsu049_u:843: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - evameva āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyam,
S06bsu049_u:844: evaṃ śikṣitavyam - yathā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho na kvacitsthito nāsthito na viṣṭhito nāviṣṭhitaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:850: yathā tathāgatasthānaṃ tathā sthāsyāmīti susthito 'sthānayogeneti evamatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyamevaṃ śikṣitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:851: evaṃ hi śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viharatyanena prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa avirahitaścānena manasikāreṇeti //
S06bsu049_u:852: atha khalu tatra parṣadi keṣāṃciddevaputrāṇāmetadabhūt - yāni tāni yakṣāṇāṃ yakṣabhāṣitāni yakṣarutāni yakṣapadāni yakṣamantritāni yakṣapravyāhṛtāni,
S06bsu049_u:854: na punaridaṃ vijñāyate yatsubhūtiḥ sthaviro bhāṣate pravyāharati deśayatyupadiśati /
S06bsu049_u:855_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāmimamevaṃrūpaṃ cetasaiva
S06bsu049_u:855_1: cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya tān devaputrānāmantrayate sma - na vijñāyate na vijñāyate idaṃ devaputrāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:858: atha khalu teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ punarevaitadabhūt - uttānīkariṣyati bata ayamāryasubhūtiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:863_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena punar api teṣāmeva devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva
S06bsu049_u:863_1: cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya tān devaputrānāmantrayate [Vaidya_20] sma - tena hi devaputrāḥ
S06bsu049_u:873: atha khalu punar api teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāmetadabhavat - kiṃrūpā asya āryasubhūterdhārmaśravaṇikā eṣṭavyāḥ?
S06bsu049_u:874_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya
S06bsu049_u:874_1: tān devaputrānāmantrayate sma - māyānirmitasadṛśā hi devaputrā mama dhārmaśravaṇikā eṣṭavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:876: tathā hi te naiva śroṣyanti na ca sākṣātkariṣyanti //
S06bsu049_u:877: atha khalu te devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocan - kiṃ punarārya subhūte māyopamāste sattvā na te māyā?
S06bsu049_u:878: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtistān devaputrānetadavocat - māyopamāste devaputrāḥ sattvāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:880: iti hi māyā ca sattvāś ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram,
S06bsu049_u:881: iti hi svapnaś ca sattvāś ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram /
S06bsu049_u:887: arhann api arhattvam api māyopamaṃ svapnopamam /
S06bsu049_u:892: atha khalu devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocan - samyaksaṃbuddho 'pyārya subhūte māyopamaḥ svapnopama iti vadasi?
S06bsu049_u:894: subhūtirāha - nirvāṇam api devaputrā māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadāmi,
S06bsu049_u:896: te devaputrā āhuḥ - nirvāṇamapyārya subhūte māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadasi?
S06bsu049_u:897: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - tadyadi devaputrā nirvāṇādapyanyaḥ kaściddharmo viśiṣṭataraḥ syāt,
S06bsu049_u:899: iti hi devaputrā māyā ca nirvāṇaṃ ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram /
S06bsu049_u:900: iti hi svapnaś ca nirvāṇaṃ ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram //
S06bsu049_u:906_0: anye ca mahāśrāvakā anekairbodhisattvasahasraiḥ sārdhamāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthaviramāmantrayante
S06bsu049_u:906_1: sma - ke 'syā āyuṣman subhūte prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ nirdiśyamānāyāḥ pratyeṣakā bhaviṣyanti?
S06bsu049_u:907: atha khalvāyuṣmānānandastān sthavirānetadavocat - te khalvāyuṣmanto veditavyā avinivartanīyā bodhisattvā [Vaidya_21] mahāsattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:910: ye 'syāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ nirdiśyamānāyāḥ pratyeṣakā bhaviṣyanti //
S06bsu049_u:911: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthavirastān sthavirānetadavocat - nāsyā āyuṣmantaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ nirdiśyamānāyāḥ kecitpratyeṣakā bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:913: tathā hi - atra na kaściddharmaḥ sūcyate,
S06bsu049_u:919: tathaivāsyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ nirdiśyamānāyā na kaścitpratyeṣako bhaviṣyati //
S06bsu049_u:920: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - asya dharmaparyāyasya āryeṇa subhūtinā bhāṣyamāṇasya pūjārthaṃ yannvahaṃ puṣpāṇyabhinirmāya āryaṃ subhūtimabhyavakireyamiti /
S06bsu049_u:921: atha khalu śakro devānāmindrastasyāṃ velāyāṃ puṣpāṇyabhinirmāya āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimabhyavākirat /
S06bsu049_u:922: atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ subhūteḥ sthavirasya śakraṃ devānāmindramanuvyāharaṇāyaitadabhūt - na khalu punarimāni puṣpāṇi mayā trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu pracaranti dṛṣṭapūrvāṇi,
S06bsu049_u:928: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmataḥ subhūteścetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - anirjātānyetānyārya subhūte puṣpāṇi /
S06bsu049_u:932: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - yattvaṃ kauśika evaṃ vadasi - anirjātānyetāni puṣpāṇi,
S06bsu049_u:936: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - gambhīraprajño batāyamāryaḥ subhūtiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:941: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmataṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametadārya subhūte, evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:942: evaṃ cātra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ yathā āryasubhūtirupadiśati /
S06bsu049_u:943: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - evametatkauśika, evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:945: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na srotaāpattiphale śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:958: evaṃ sa na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu049_u:961: yo na rūpasya vivṛddhaye śikṣate na parihāṇāya /
S06bsu049_u:962: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu049_u:963: yo na vijñānasya vivṛddhaye śikṣate na parihāṇāya,
S06bsu049_u:964: sa na rūpasya parigrahāya śikṣate notsargāya /
S06bsu049_u:965: [Vaidya_22] evaṃ sa na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu049_u:972: sa na sarvajñatāyā api parigrahāya śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:974: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:976: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - ya āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kasyaciddharmasya parigrahāya śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:978: sa na sarvajñatāyā api parigrahāya śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:980: evaṃ śikṣamāṇa āyuṣmān subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:982: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - evametadāyuṣman śāriputra, evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:983: ya āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kasyaciddharmasya parigrahāya śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:985: sa na sarvajñatāyā api parigrahāya śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:989: evaṃ cāyuṣman śāriputra śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:991: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - prajñāpāramitā ārya śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kuto gaveṣitavyāḥ?
S06bsu049_u:992: śāriputra āha - prajñāpāramitā kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena āyuṣmataḥ subhūteḥ parivartādgaveṣitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:993: evamukte śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - kasyaiṣa ārya śāriputra anubhāvo veditavyaḥ?
S06bsu049_u:995: āyuṣmān śāriputra āha - tathāgatasyaiṣa kauśika anubhāvo veditavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:996: tathāgatasyaitadadhiṣṭhānaṃ veditavyaṃ yadāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣate /
S06bsu049_u:997: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - yatkauśika evaṃ vadasi - kasyaiṣo 'nubhāvo veditavyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:998: kasyaitadanuṣṭhānaṃ veditavyaṃ yadāryasubhūtiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣate iti?
S06bsu049_u:1001: yad api kauśika evaṃ vadasi - prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kuto gaveṣitavyeti?
S06bsu049_u:1002: prajñāpāramitā kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na rūpādgaveṣitavyā nāpyanyatra rūpādgaveṣitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:1003: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārebhyaḥ na vijñānādgaveṣitavyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:1008: evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:1011: evamukte śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - mahāpāramiteyamārya subhūte yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:1021: rūpamahattayā hi kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:1043: kathaṃ punaḥ kauśika ārambaṇānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā?
S06bsu049_u:1044: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi kauśika yato nānto na madhyaṃ na paryavasānamupalabhyate,
S06bsu049_u:1046: anena kauśika paryāyeṇa ārambaṇānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:1048: na teṣāmanto vā madhyaṃ vā paryavasānaṃ vā upalabhyate,
S06bsu049_u:1051: rūpasya hi kauśika nānto na madhyaṃ na paryavasānamupalabhyate /
S06bsu049_u:1053: vijñānasya hi kauśika nānto na madhyaṃ na paryavasānamupalabhyate /
S06bsu049_u:1054: anenāpi kauśika paryāyeṇa ārambaṇānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā //
S06bsu049_u:1057: na hi sattvasyānto vā madhyaṃ vā paryavasānaṃ vopalabhyate /
S06bsu049_u:1059: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kathamāyuṣman subhūte sattvānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā?
S06bsu049_u:1060: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - na hi kauśika gaṇanāyogena vā gaṇanābahutvena vā sattvānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā //
S06bsu049_u:1061: śakra āha - kathaṃ tarhīdānīmārya subhūte sattvānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta [Vaidya_24] prajñāpāramitā?
S06bsu049_u:1062: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - tatkaṃ manyase kauśika katamasyaitaddharmasyādhivacanaṃ yaduta sattvaḥ sattva iti?
S06bsu049_u:1063: śakra āha - naitadārya subhūte dharmasyādhivacanaṃ na adharmādhivacanaṃ yaduta sattvaḥ sattva iti /
S06bsu049_u:1067: anārambaṇametannāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yaduta sattvaḥ sattva iti /
S06bsu049_u:1068: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - tatkiṃ manyase kauśika kācidatra sattvaparidīpanā kṛtā?
S06bsu049_u:1070: subhūtirāha - yatra kauśika na kācitsattvaparidīpanā kṛtā,
S06bsu049_u:1072: sacetkauśika tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'nantavijñaptighoṣeṇa gambhīranirghoṣeṇa svareṇa gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān api vitiṣṭhamānaḥ sattvaḥ sattva iti vācaṃ bhāṣeta,
S06bsu049_u:1073: api nu tatra kaścitsattva utpanno va utpatsyate vā utpadyate vā,
S06bsu049_u:1074: niruddho vā nirotsyate vā nirudhyate vā?
S06bsu049_u:1078: subhūtirāha - anenāpi kauśika paryāyeṇa evaṃ sattvānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:1079: evaṃ ca punaḥ kauśika sattvānantatayā prajñāpāramitānantatā veditavyā //
S06bsu049_u:1080: atha khalu sendrakā devāḥ sabrahmakāḥ saprajāpatikāḥ sarṣinaranārīgaṇāstrirudānamudānayanti sma - aho dharmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:1084: sa āryeṇa subhūtinā sthavireṇa subhāṣiteneha sūcyate deśyate prakāśyate prabhāvyate /
S06bsu049_u:1085: tathāgataṃ taṃ vayaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamadyāgreṇa dhārayiṣyāmo yo 'nayā prajñāpāramitayā avirahito bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:1086: yo 'pi ca anena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa vihariṣyati //
S06bsu049_u:1087: atha khalu bhagavāṃstān sendrakān sabrahmakān saprajāpatikān sarṣinaranārīgaṇānāmantrayate sma - evametaddevaputrāḥ, evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:1088: yadāhaṃ devaputrā dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike dīpavatyāṃ rājadhānyāmantarāyaṇamadhyagato 'nayā prajñāpāramitayā avirahito 'bhūvam,
S06bsu049_u:1089_0: tadāhaṃ dīpaṃkareṇa tathāgatenārhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhena vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06bsu049_u:1089_1: - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava anāgate 'dhvani asaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpaiḥ śākyamunirnāma tathāgato
S06bsu049_u:1089_3: śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyānāṃ ca buddho bhagavāniti /
S06bsu049_u:1090: atha khalu te devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan - āścaryaṃ bhagavan,
S06bsu049_u:1092: yāvadiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sarvajñatāyā āhārikā anuparigrāhikā ceti //
S06bsu049_u:1097: atha khalu bhagavān ye tatra devaputrāḥ parṣadi saṃnipatitāḥ saṃniṣaṇṇāścābhūvan,
S06bsu049_u:1099: tān devaputrān saṃnipatitān saṃniṣaṇṇāṃś ca viditvā,
S06bsu049_u:1100: tāś ca sarvāścatasraḥ parṣadaḥ saṃnipatitāḥ saṃniṣaṇṇāś ca viditvā,
S06bsu049_u:1101: kāmāvacarān rūpāvacarāṃś ca devaputrān brahmakāyikāṃś ca devaputrān ābhāsvarāṃś ca parīttaśubhāṃś ca akaniṣṭhāṃś ca devaputrān sākṣiṇaḥ sthāpayitvā,
S06bsu049_u:1102_0: śakradevendrapramukhān kāmāvacarān devaputrān mahābrahmapramukhāṃś ca brahmakāyikān
S06bsu049_u:1102_1: devaputrānābhāsvarāṃś ca devaputrānāmantrayate sma - yo hi kaściddevaputrāḥ kulaputro
S06bsu049_u:1102_2: vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:1103: na tasya māro vā mārakāyikā vā devatā avatāraprekṣiṇyo 'vatāragaveṣiṇyo 'vatāraṃ lapsyante /
S06bsu049_u:1104: nāpi tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā manuṣyā vā amanuṣyā vā avatāraprekṣiṇo 'vatāragaveṣiṇo 'vatāraṃ lapsyante /
S06bsu049_u:1105: nāpi sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā viṣamāparihāreṇa kālaṃ kariṣyati //
S06bsu049_u:1106: punaraparaṃ devaputrāḥ ye devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:1107: yaiś ca devaputrairiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā nodgṛhītā na dhāritā na vācitā na paryavāptā na pravartitā,
S06bsu049_u:1108: te devaputrāstaṃ kulaputra vā kuladuhitaraṃ vā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante,
S06bsu049_u:1109: tasya ca kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇato dhārayato vācayataḥ paryavāpnuvataḥ pravartayamānasyāntikācchroṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:1110: śrutvā codgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:1111_0: na ca khalu punardevaputrāstasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇato
S06bsu049_u:1111_1: dhārayato vācayataḥ paryavāpnuvataḥ pravartayamānasya araṇyagatasya vā vṛkṣamūlagatasya

S06bsu049_u:2066: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - kiṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāmeva bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati nānyāsu pāramitāsu?

S06bsu049_u:2881_8: yāvacca anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtānāṃ yāvacca saddharmo nāntarhitaḥ,

S06bsu049_u:3602: teṣāṃ tatrāpi mahānirayānmahānirayaṃ saṃkrāmatāṃ tatrāpi punareva tathaiva tejaḥsaṃvartanī prādurbhaviṣyati /

S06bsu049_u:3606: teṣāṃ tatrāpi suciraṃ mahānirayānmahānirayaṃ saṃkrāmatāṃ tatrāpi tathaiva tejaḥsaṃvartanī prādurbhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:3607: te tasyāṃ tejaḥsaṃvartanyāṃ prādurbhūtāyāṃ punareva tataścyutāstenaiva akṣīṇena sāvaśeṣeṇa karmaṇā ihaiva lokadhātau punaḥ kṣepsyante /
S06bsu049_u:3609: te punareva tāni mahānirayeṣu mahānti mahānirayaduḥkhāni [Vaidya_91] pratyanubhaviṣyanti /

S06bsu049_u:3617_0: pañcānantaryāṇi śāriputra karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitānyasya manoduścaritasya ca vāgduścaritasya
S06bsu049_u:3617_1: ca na prativarṇikāny api na anurūpāṇy api na pratirūpāṇy api asya karmaṇaḥ kṛtasya
S06bsu049_u:3618: ye kecidimāṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ deśyamānāmupadiśyamānāmuddiśyamānāṃ pratibādhitavyāṃ maṃsyante,
S06bsu049_u:3625: te svasaṃtānān saviṣān kṛtvā parasaṃtānān saviṣān kariṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:3627: svayaṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāmajānānā anavabudhyamānāḥ parān api grāhayiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:3630: kutastaiḥ saha saṃvāsaṃ kuto vā lābhasatkāraṃ kutaḥ sthānam?
S06bsu049_u:3632: dharmadūṣakā hi te śāriputra tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyā iti /
S06bsu049_u:3634: kṛṣṇānirjātikāḥ kṛṣṇāhijātikāste śāriputra tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:3635: teṣāṃ śāriputra tathārūpāṇāṃ pudgālānāṃ ye śrotavyaṃ maṃsyante,
S06bsu049_u:3638: ime te śāriputra dharmadūṣakāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:3639: śāriputra āha - na bhagavatā tasya pudgalasya tatropapannasya mahānirayagatasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇamākhyātam /
S06bsu049_u:3640: bhagavānāha - tiṣṭhatu śāriputra tasya pudgalasya tatropapannasya mahānirayagatasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇam /
S06bsu049_u:3642: mā tathārūpasya pudgalasya tadātmabhāvasya pramāṇaṃ śrutvā uṣṇaṃ rūdhiraṃ mukhādāgacchet,
S06bsu049_u:3649: maiva mahāpratibhayaṃ tasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇamaśrauṣīdyasyeme doṣāḥ saṃvidyante //
S06bsu049_u:3650: na bhagavānāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyāvakāśaṃ karoti - iyattasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
S06bsu049_u:3651: dvitīyakam api tṛtīyakamapyāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - ākhyātu me bhagavāṃstasya pudgalasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇam /
S06bsu049_u:3652: paścimāyā janatāyā ālokaḥ kṛto bhaviṣyatianena vāṅbhanaḥkarmaṇā kṛtena saṃcitenopacitenopacitena evaṃ mahāntaṃ mahānirayeṣvātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇīteti /
S06bsu049_u:3653: bhagavānāha - eṣa eva śāriputra paścimāyā janatāyā ālokaḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:3654: yadanena vāṅbhanoduścaritena akuśalena karmābhisaṃskāreṇa abhisaṃskṛtena saṃcitenācitenopacitena iyacciraduḥkhaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyatīti /
S06bsu049_u:3655: yā etasyaiva śāriputra duḥkhasyāprameyatā bahuduḥkhatā [Vaidya_92] vyākhyātā,
S06bsu049_u:3656: eṣa eva śuklāṃśikasya kulaputrasya kuladuhiturvā saṃvego bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:3657: tataḥ sa tebhyo dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyebhyaḥ karmabhyo vinivṛtya puṇyābhisaṃskārameva kuryāt,
S06bsu049_u:3658: jīvitahetor api saddharmaṃ na pratikṣepsyati - mā bhūdasmākam api tādṛśairduḥkhai samavadhānamiti //
S06bsu049_u:3659: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - susaṃvṛtakāyakarmavākkarmamanaskarmaṇā bhagavan kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā bhavitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:3661: yatra hi nāma bhagavan evaṃrūpeṇa vāgdurbhāṣitena iyān mahāpuṇyaskandhaḥ prasūyate /
S06bsu049_u:3662: katamena punarbhagavan karmaṇā iyān mahāpuṇyaskandhaḥ prasūyate /
S06bsu049_u:3663: bhagavānāha - evaṃrūpeṇa subhūte vāgdurbhāṣitena iyān mahāpuṇyaskandhaḥ prasūyate /
S06bsu049_u:3664: ihaiva te subhūte mohapuruṣāḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:3665: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dūṣayitavyāṃ maṃsyante,
S06bsu049_u:3668: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ ca pratibādhitāyāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhabodhiḥ pratibādhitā bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:3669: buddhabodhau pratibādhitāyāmatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvajñatā pratibādhitā bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:3672: tathāgataśrāvakasaṃghe 'pi pratibādhite evaṃ tasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ triratnātparibāhyabhāvo bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:3674: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - ko 'tra bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yatsa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pratibādhitavyāṃ maṃsyate?
S06bsu049_u:3675: bhagavānāha - mārādhiṣṭhito vā subhūte sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:3676: duṣprajñasaṃvartanīyena vā karmaṇā gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu nāsya śraddhā,
S06bsu049_u:3678: ābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ pāpābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgataḥ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pratibādhiṣyate /
S06bsu049_u:3679: punaraparaṃ subhūte sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā pāpamitrahastagato vā bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:3682: ātmotkarṣī pareṣāṃ paṃsako doṣāntaraprekṣī vā bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:3683: ebhirapi subhūte caturbhirākāraiḥ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā samanvāgato bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:3684: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ deśyamānāmupadiśyamānāṃ pratibādhitavyāṃ maṃsyate iti //
S06bsu049_u:3689: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - duradhimocā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā anabhiyuktena kuśalamūlavirahitena pāpamitrahastagatena /
S06bsu049_u:3691_0: duradhimocā subhūte prajñāpāramitā anabhiyuktena parīttakuśalamūlena durmedhasā anarthikena
S06bsu049_u:3692: subhūtirāha - kiyadgambhīrā bateyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā duradhimocatayā?
S06bsu049_u:3720: paramaduradhimocā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā anabhiyuktena anavaropitakuśalamūlena pāpamitrahastagatena māravaśagatena kusīdena hīnavīryeṇa muṣitasmṛtinā duṣprajñena /
S06bsu049_u:3723: paramaduradhimocā subhūte prajñāpāramitā anabhiyuktena anavaropitakuśalamūlena pāpamitrahastagatena māravaśagatena kusīdena hīnavīryeṇa muṣitasmṛtinā duṣprajñena /
S06bsu049_u:3729: iti hi subhūte rūpaviśuddhiś ca phalaviśuddhiś ca advayametadadvaidhīkāramabhinnamacchinnam /
S06bsu049_u:3730: iti hi subhūte phalaviśuddhito rūpaviśuddhī rupaviśuddhitaḥ phalaviśuddhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:3735: iti hi subhūte vijñānaviśuddhiś ca phalaviśuddhiś ca advayametadadvaidhīkāramabhinnamacchinnam /
S06bsu049_u:3736: iti hi subhūte phalaviśuddhito vijñānaviśuddhirvijñānaviśuddhitaḥ phalaviśuddhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:3737: punaraparaṃ subhūte yā rūpaviśuddhiḥ sā sarvajñatāviśuddhiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:3739: iti hi subhūte rūpaviśuddhiś ca sarvajñatāviśuddhiś ca advayametadadvaidhīkāramabhinnamacchinnam /
S06bsu049_u:3745: iti hi subhūte vijñānaviśuddhiś ca sarvajñatāviśuddhiś ca advayametadadvaidhīkāramabhinnamacchinnam /
S06bsu049_u:3748: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:3764: āha - na jānāti na saṃjānīte bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:3766: āha - kiṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā na jānāti na saṃjānīte?
S06bsu049_u:3767: bhagavānāha - rūpaṃ śāriputra prajñāpāramitā na jānāti na saṃjānīte /
S06bsu049_u:3771: vijñānaṃ śāriputra prajñāpāramitā na jānāti na saṃjānīte /
S06bsu049_u:3774: āha - prajñāpāramitā bhagavan sarvajñatāyā nāpakāraṃ karoti,
S06bsu049_u:3777: āha - prajñāpāramitā bhagavan na kaṃciddharmaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06bsu049_u:3780: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - ātmaviśuddhito bhagavan rūpaviśuddhiḥ?
S06bsu049_u:3795: āha - ya evamasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhagavan avabodhaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:3798: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - sā khalu punariyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā nāpare tīre,
S06bsu049_u:3802: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - evam api bhagavan saṃjñāsyate bodhisattvo mahāsattvo riñciṣyatīmāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dūrīkariṣyatīmāṃ prajñāpāramitām /
S06bsu049_u:3806: nāmato 'pi hi subhūto saṅgo nimittato 'pi saṅgaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:3807: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā svākhyātā sunirdiṣṭā supariniṣṭhitā,
S06bsu049_u:3808: yatra hi nāma bhagavatā ime 'pi saṅgā ākhyātāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:3809: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - katame te āyuṣman subhūte saṅgāḥ?
S06bsu049_u:3813: atīteṣu dharmeṣvatītā dharmā iti saṃjānīte, saṅgaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:3814: anāgateṣu dharmeṣvanāgatā dharmā iti saṃjānīte, saṅgaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:3815: pratyutpanneṣu dharmeṣu pratyutpannā dharmā iti saṃjānīte, saṅgaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:3816: iyantaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasūyate bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalaḥ prathamena cittotpādeneti saṃjānīte, saṅgaḥ //
S06bsu049_u:3817: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - katamena ārya subhūte paryāyeṇa saṅgaḥ?
S06bsu049_u:3818: subhūtirāha - sacetkauśika tadbodhicittaṃ saṃjānīte - idaṃ tatprathamaṃ bodhicittamiti,
S06bsu049_u:3820: na ca cittaprakṛtiḥ śakyā pariṇāmayituṃ tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā mahāyānasaṃprasthitena /
S06bsu049_u:3821_0: tasmāttarhi kauśika paraṃ saṃdarśayatā samādāpayatā samuttejayatā saṃpraharṣayatā
S06bsu049_u:3821_1: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau bhūtānugamena saṃdarśayitavyaṃ samādāpayitavyaṃ samuttejayitavyaṃ
S06bsu049_u:3823: buddhānujñātayā ca samādāpanayā paraṃ samādāpayati sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā /
S06bsu049_u:3825: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu subhūte,
S06bsu049_u:3827: tena hi subhūte anyān api sūkṣmatarān saṅgānākhyāsyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:3829: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru /
S06bsu049_u:3832: bhagavānetadavocat - iha subhūte śrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ nimittato manasi karoti /
S06bsu049_u:3837_0: iti hi so 'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ ye anāsravā dharmāstānanumode
S06bsu049_u:3837_1: ityanumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ kuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayāmīti pariṇāmayati /
S06bsu049_u:3838: yā khalu punaḥ subhūte dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā,
S06bsu049_u:3839: na sā atītā vā anāgatā vā pratyutpannā vā /
S06bsu049_u:3843: na sā śakyā pariṇāmayituṃ na nimittīkartuṃ nārambaṇīkartum /
S06bsu049_u:3856: tathā hi subhūte akṛtāḥ sarvadharmāstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenābhisaṃbuddhāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:3857: subhūtirāha - tasmāttarhi bhagavan sarvadharmā anabhisaṃbuddhāstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena?
S06bsu049_u:3858: bhagavānāha - tathāhi subhūte prakṛtyaiva na te dharmāḥ kiṃcit /
S06bsu049_u:3871: evametāḥ subhūte sarvāḥ saṅgakoṭyo vivarjitā bhavanti //
S06bsu049_u:3875: bhagavānāha - tathā hi subhūte na kaścidabhisaṃbudhyate /
S06bsu049_u:3877: bhagavānāha - tathā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā na cittena jñātavyā na cittagamanīyā /
S06bsu049_u:3880: āha - tena hi bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ kathaṃ caritavyam?
S06bsu049_u:3881: bhagavānāha - sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranna rūpe carati,
S06bsu049_u:3883: evaṃ sacenna vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu /
S06bsu049_u:3907: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadyadevaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sasaṅgatā ca asaṅgatā ca khyātāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:3908: bhagavānāha - rūpaṃ sasaṅgamasaṅgamiti subhūte na carati,
S06bsu049_u:3915: evaṃ yāvanmanaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā sasaṅgāsaṅgeti na carati,
S06bsu049_u:3926: evaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣā dharmā balāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvido aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ sasaṅgāsaṅgā iti na carati,
S06bsu049_u:3938: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpe saṅgaṃ janayati,
S06bsu049_u:3939: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu /
S06bsu049_u:3946: na śīlapāramitāyāṃ na kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ na vīryapāramitāyāṃ na dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṅgaṃ janayati,
S06bsu049_u:3953: na sakṛdāgāmiphale na anāgāmiphale na arhattve saṅgaṃ janayati,
S06bsu049_u:3958: asaktā abaddhā amuktā asamatikrāntā hi subhūte sarvajñatā /
S06bsu049_u:3959: evaṃ hi subhūte sarvasaṅgasamatikramāya bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam //
S06bsu049_u:3966: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sādhu sādhu subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:3968: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭhannākāśasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeta,
S06bsu049_u:3971: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte māyāpuruṣo bhāṣyamāṇe 'pi varṇe nānunīyate na saṃkliśyate,
S06bsu049_u:3977: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - duṣkarakārako bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yo gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan na saṃsīdati notplavate /
S06bsu049_u:3984: ākāśena sārdhaṃ sa bhagavan saṃnaddhukāmo yaḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ badhnāti /
S06bsu049_u:3986: śūro bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ya ākāśasamānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmadhātusamānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnaddhukāmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:3989: mahāvīryapāramitāsaṃnāhaprāptaḥ sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ya ākāśasamānāṃ dharmadhātusamānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyate //

S06bsu049_u:6848: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte srotaāpannaḥ srotaāpattiphale svakāyāṃ bhūmau na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati /
S06bsu049_u:6853: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣa ānantaryakārī ānantaryacittena avirahito bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:6855: na taccittaṃ śaknoti prativinodayituṃ [Vaidya_168] vā viṣkambhayituṃ vā /
S06bsu049_u:6857: evameva subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyacittaṃ sthitaṃ bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:6859: sadevamānuṣāsureṇāpi lokena na śakyaṃ cālayituṃ vā kampayituṃ vā /
S06bsu049_u:6862: tasya svasyāṃ bhūmau niṣkāṅkṣasya nirvicikitsasya jātivyativṛttasyāpi na śrāvakacittaṃ na pratyekabuddhacittaṃ votpadyate /
S06bsu049_u:6864: abhisaṃbhotsye evāhamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ svasyāṃ bhūmau sthitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:6868: tathā hi sa sthito 'saṃhāryeṇa cittena asaṃhāryeṇa jñānena samanvāgato bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:6872: na tava te ākārāstāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni vā saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:6876: veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ bodhisattvo vyākṛtaḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti /
S06bsu049_u:6877: sacetpunarevaṃ samanvāharati - māro batāyaṃ pāpīyān buddhaveṣamabhinirmāyopasaṃkrāntaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:6882: evaṃ samanvāharati - māro batāyaṃ pāpīyān buddhādhiṣṭhānaṃ kṛtvā māṃ vivecayitukāmo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhita iti /
S06bsu049_u:6884: veditavyametatsubhūte vyākṛto 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:6886: sacetsubhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ime ākārā imāni liṅgāni imāni nimittāni saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:6888: addhā batāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākṛtaḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:6891: tathā hyasya te ākārāstāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:6893: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ //
S06bsu049_u:6894: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saddharmaparigrahasya kṛtaśaḥ ātmaparityāgam api karoti,
S06bsu049_u:6896: tasmādbodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyaḥ saddharmaparigrahāya paramudyogamāpadyate atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ premṇā ca gauraveṇa ca /
S06bsu049_u:6897: dharmakāyā buddhā bhagavanta iti dharme prema ca gauravaṃ copādāya [Vaidya_169] saddharmaparigrahaṃ karoti /
S06bsu049_u:6899: pratyutpannānām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmeṣa eva saddharmaparigrahaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:6900: anāgatānām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmeṣa eva saddharmaparigrahaḥ - aham api tatra teṣāmanāgatānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ saṃkhyāṃ gaṇanāṃ praviṣṭa iti,
S06bsu049_u:6903: sa imamapyarthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan saddharmaparigrahasya kṛtaśa ātmaparityāgam api karoti,
S06bsu049_u:6907: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ //
S06bsu049_u:6908: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya dharmaṃ deśayato na kāṅkṣati,
S06bsu049_u:6910: subhūtirāha - kiṃ tathāgatasyaiva bhagavan dharmaṃ deśayato na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati,
S06bsu049_u:6912: bhagavānāha - śrāvakasyāpi subhūte dharmaṃ deśayato na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati /
S06bsu049_u:6914: tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā /
S06bsu049_u:6918: ebhiḥ subhūte guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:6919: imāny api subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ākāraliṅganimittāni veditavyānyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti //
S06bsu049_u:6924: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan mahāguṇasamanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:6927: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametatsubhūte, evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:6929: avinivartanīyena hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anantamaparyantaṃ jñānaṃ pratilabdhamasaṃhāryaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ //
S06bsu049_u:6930: subhūtirāha - pratibalo bhagavan avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpānākārān liṅgāni nimittāni nirdeṣṭum /
S06bsu049_u:6931: ata eva bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gambhīrāṇi gambhīrāṇi sthānāni prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni sūcayitavyāni /
S06bsu049_u:6932: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sādhu sādhu subhūte yastvaṃ gambhīrāṇi gambhīrāṇi sthānānyārabhya nigamayitukāmaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:6934: ānimittasya apraṇihitasya anabhisaṃskārasya anutpādasya ajāterabhāvasya virāgasya nirodhasya nirvāṇasya vigamasyaitatsubhūte adhivacanaṃ yaduta gambhīramiti //
S06bsu049_u:6935: subhūtirāha - eteṣāmeva bhagavan kevalametaddharmāṇāmadhivacanaṃ na punaḥ sarvadharmāṇām?
S06bsu049_u:6956: yatra subhūte na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānam,
S06bsu049_u:6959: subhūtirāha - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvatsūkṣmeṇopāyena rūpataś ca nivārito nirvāṇaṃ ca sucitam /
S06bsu049_u:6961: yāvatsūkṣmeṇopāyena vijñānataś ca nivārito nirvāṇaṃ ca sūcitam /
S06bsu049_u:6962_0: bhagavānāha - imāni subhūte gambhīrāṇi gambhīrāṇi sthānāni prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni
S06bsu049_u:6962_1: yaścintayiṣyanti tulayiṣyati upanidhyāsyati - evaṃ mayā sthātavyaṃ yathā prajñāpāramitāyāmājñaptam /
S06bsu049_u:6965: tathā saṃpādayamānastathopanidhyāyaṃstathopaparīkṣamāṇastathā prayujyamānastathā ghaṭamānastathā vyāyacchamāna ekadivasamapyatra yogamāpadyate /
S06bsu049_u:6967: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣo rāgacarito vitarkacaritaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:6968: tasya puruṣasya rāgacaritasya vitarkacaritasya striyā abhirūpayā prāsādikayā darśanīyayā saha saṃketaḥ kṛto bhavet /
S06bsu049_u:6969: sā khalu punaḥ strī [Vaidya_171] paraparigṛhītā bhavet /
S06bsu049_u:6971: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte kiṃpratisaṃyuktāstasya puruṣasya vitarkāḥ pravarteran?
S06bsu049_u:6972: subhūtirāha - strīpratisaṃyuktā eva bhagavaṃstasya puruṣasya vitarkāḥ pravarteran - iyamāgacchati, iyamāgatā /
S06bsu049_u:6977: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte divasasyātyayena tasya puruṣasya kiyanto vitarkā utpadyeran?
S06bsu049_u:6978: subhūtirāha - bahavo bhagavan divasasyātyayena tasya puruṣasya vitarkā utpadyeran /
S06bsu049_u:6979: bhagavānāha - yāvantaḥ subhūte tasya puruṣasya divasasyātyayena vitarkā utpadyeran,
S06bsu049_u:6980: iyataḥ subhūte kalpān bodhisattvo mahāsattvaśchorayati vipṛṣṭhīkaroti saṃsārādvyantīkaroti,
S06bsu049_u:6981: ya iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathājñaptaṃ yathākhyātaṃ yathopadiṣṭaṃ yathoddiṣṭaṃ yathānirdiṣṭaṃ tiṣṭhati śikṣate pratipadyate upanidhyāyati yogamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:6984: evaṃ hi subhūte yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyogamanuyuktaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:6987: yaś ca prajñāpāramitāvirahito bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu049_u:6988: ayameva tato viśiṣyate yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evamekadivasam api prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyate //
S06bsu049_u:6989: punaraparaṃ subhūte yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan srotaāpannebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu049_u:6996: yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yathopadiṣṭaṃ yathoddiṣṭaṃ yathānirdiṣṭaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ tathaiva yogamāpadyeta ekadivasam api /
S06bsu049_u:6997: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvastataḥ paurvakādbodhisattvadbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati //
S06bsu049_u:6998: punaraparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan srotaāpanneṣu yāvatsamyaksaṃbuddheṣu dānaṃ dadyāt pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06bsu049_u:7001: yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihārī tato manasikārādvyutthāya dharmaṃ deśayet,
S06bsu049_u:7002: ayameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastataḥ paurvakādbodhisattvādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati //
S06bsu049_u:7003: punaraparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan srotaāpanneṣu yāvatsamyaksaṃbuddheṣu dānaṃ dadyāt pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06bsu049_u:7007: yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihārī tato manasikāradvyutthāya dharmadānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu049_u:7008: ayameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsattvastataḥ paurvakādbodhisattvādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati //
S06bsu049_u:7009: [Vaidya_172] punaraparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan srotaāpanneṣu yāvatsamyaksaṃbuddheṣu dānaṃ dadyāt pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06bsu049_u:7011: ārabdhavīryaḥ san dhyāneṣu bodhipakṣeṣu ca dharmeṣu yogamāpadyeta,
S06bsu049_u:7013: yaś ca khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā dharmadānaṃ datvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet,
S06bsu049_u:7014: ayameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastataḥ paurvakādbodhisattvādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati //
S06bsu049_u:7015: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā dharmadānaṃ datvā prajñāpāramitoktena pariṇāmena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet,
S06bsu049_u:7017: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā dharmadānaṃ datvā prajñāpāramitoktena pariṇāmena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet,
S06bsu049_u:7018: pariṇāmya ca pratisaṃlāne na punareva yogamāpadyeta /
S06bsu049_u:7019: yaś ca khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā dharmadānameva dadyāt,
S06bsu049_u:7021: sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na tāvatpuṇyaṃ prasavati,
S06bsu049_u:7022: yāvadya evaṃ dharmadānaṃ dadad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratisaṃlāne ca punareva yogamāpadyamānaḥ prajñāpāramitayā ca parigṛhītastatpratisaṃlānamavirahitaṃ karoti prajñāpāramitayā,
S06bsu049_u:7023: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati //
S06bsu049_u:7024: subhūtirāha - yadā bhagavan abhisaṃskāro vikalpa ityuktaṃ bhagavatā,
S06bsu049_u:7026: bhagavānāha - so 'pīdānīṃ subhūte puṇyābhisaṃskāro bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śūnyaka ityevākhyāyate,
S06bsu049_u:7030: yathā yathā khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ sarvadharmān pratyavekṣate,
S06bsu049_u:7031: tathā tathā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'virahito bhavati prajñāpāramitayā /
S06bsu049_u:7032: yathā yathā ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'virahito bhavati prajñāpāramitayā,
S06bsu049_u:7034: subhūtirāha - aprameyasya ca bhagavan asaṃkhyeyasya ca kiṃ nānākaraṇaṃ vā,
S06bsu049_u:7037: asaṃkhyeyamiti subhūte yanna śakyaṃ saṃkhyayāpi kṣapayitum //
S06bsu049_u:7041: bhagavānāha - yatsubhūtirevamāha - syādbhagavan paryāyo yadrūpamaprameyaṃ bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:7051: [Vaidya_173] subhūtirāha - kiṃ śūnyatāyā eva bhagavan kevalametadadhivacanamaprameyamiti,
S06bsu049_u:7054: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte nanu mayā sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā ityākhyātāḥ?
S06bsu049_u:7060: tasmāttarhi subhūte eṣāṃ dharmāṇāmarthato viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā nopalabhyate /
S06bsu049_u:7061: abhilāpā ete subhūte tathāgatenākhyātāḥ abhilapitāḥ - aprameyamiti vā,
S06bsu049_u:7074: subhūtirāha - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadyadiyaṃ tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmatā deśitā,
S06bsu049_u:7087: dānapāramitāyā api bhagavan na vṛddhirna parihāṇirbhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:7092: prajñāpāramitāyā api bhagavan na vṛddhirna parihāṇirbhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:7093: sacedbhagavan āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ na vṛddhirna parihāṇiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7094: kathaṃ bhagavan vivardhamānānāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ balena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate?
S06bsu049_u:7096: na ca bhagavan apratipūrayan pāramitāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhyāsannībhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7098: na khalu punaḥ subhūte pāramitārthasya kācidvṛddhirvāsti parihāṇirvā vidyate /
S06bsu049_u:7099: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayata upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ dānapāramitā vivardhate,
S06bsu049_u:7101: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati - nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta dānapāramiteti /
S06bsu049_u:7102: sa dānaṃ dadat tān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
S06bsu049_u:7104: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ śīlapāramitā vivardhate,
S06bsu049_u:7106: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati - nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta śīlapāramiteti /
S06bsu049_u:7107: sa śīlaṃ samādāya vartamānastān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
S06bsu049_u:7109: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ kṣāntipāramitā vivardhate,
S06bsu049_u:7111: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati - nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta kṣāntipāramiteti /
S06bsu049_u:7112: sa kṣāntyā saṃpādayaṃstān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni ca kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
S06bsu049_u:7114: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayata upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ vīryapāramitā vivardhate,
S06bsu049_u:7116: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati - nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta vīryapāramiteti /
S06bsu049_u:7117: sa vīryamārabhamāṇastān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni ca kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati /
S06bsu049_u:7119: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ dhyānapāramitā vivardhate,
S06bsu049_u:7121: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati - nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta dhyānapāramiteti /
S06bsu049_u:7122: sa dhyānāni samāpadyamānastān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni ca kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
S06bsu049_u:7124: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā vivardhate,
S06bsu049_u:7126: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati - nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta prajñāpāramiteti /
S06bsu049_u:7127: sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayaṃstān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni ca kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
S06bsu049_u:7129: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kā punareṣā bhagavan anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ?
S06bsu049_u:7137: evaṃ khalu subhūte anabhilapyasyārthasya na vṛddhirna parihāṇirbhavati /
S06bsu049_u:7139: evaṃ sarvadharmāṇām api subhūte na vṛddhirna parihāṇirbhavati /

S06bsu049_u:7467: atha khalvāyuṣmata ānandasyaitadabhūt - ye tatrākṣobhyasya tathāgatāsyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:7469: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmata ānandasya imamevaṃrūpaṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - evametadānanda, evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:7471: ye akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya buddhakṣetre brahmacaryaṃ caranti /
S06bsu049_u:7473: tasya khalu punarānanda suvarṇapuṣpasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya na pramāṇabaddhaḥ śrāvakasaṃgho bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:7475: tāvanto hyānanda tatra śrāvakā bhaviṣyanti yeṣāṃ nāsti pramāṇam /
S06bsu049_u:7476: api tvaprameyā asaṃkhyeyā ityevaṃ saṃkhyāṃ gamiṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:7477: tena khalu punarānanda kālena tena samayena tasmin buddhakṣetre na vyālakāntārāṇi bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:7478: na caurakāntārāṇi na pānīyakāntārāṇi na vyādhikāntārāṇi na durbhikṣakāntārāṇi bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:7479: etāni cānyāni ca ānanda asātakāntārāṇi tasmin buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:7481_0: suvarṇapuṣpasya khalu punarānanda tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya anuttarāṃ
S06bsu049_u:7483: evamukte āyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - anayā bhagavan gaṅgadevayā bhaginyā katamasya tathāgatasyāntike prathamacittotpādakuśalamūlamavaropitamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
S06bsu049_u:7484_0: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - anayā ānanda gaṅgadevayā bhaginyā
S06bsu049_u:7486: sa ca dīpaṃkarastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ suvarṇapuṣpairevāvakīrṇo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prārthayamānayā /
S06bsu049_u:7488: anutpattikeṣu ca mayā dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā,
S06bsu049_u:7489_0: tato 'haṃ dīpaṃkareṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06bsu049_u:7489_1: - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇavaka anāgate 'dhvani śākyamunirnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho
S06bsu049_u:7489_2: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca
S06bsu049_u:7490: tadā etasyā bhaginyā mama vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā evaṃ cittamudapādi - aho bata ahamapyevaṃ vyākriyeya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau yathāyaṃ māṇavako vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:7491: evaṃ ca ānanda etasyā bhaginyā dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike prathamacittotpādakuśalamūlamavaropitamabhūdanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:7492: evamukte āyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - kṛtaparikarmā bateyaṃ bhagavan kṛtaparyantā gaṅgadevā bhaginī vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:7494: evam etat yathā vadasi - kṛtaparikarmā bateyaṃ kṛtaparyantā gaṅgadevā bhaginī vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti //
S06bsu049_u:7499: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhagavaṃścaratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kathaṃ śūnyatāyāṃ parijayaḥ kartavyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7501: bhagavānāha - iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā rūpaṃ śūnyamiti pratyavekṣitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:7504: tathā ca pratyavekṣitavyamavikṣiptayā cittasaṃtatyā yathā pratyavekṣamāṇo rūpamiti tāṃ dharmatāṃ dharmatayā na samanupaśyet /
S06bsu049_u:7505: tāṃ ca asamanupaśyan dharmatāṃ na sākṣātkuryādbhūtakoṭim /
S06bsu049_u:7506: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yadbhagavānevamāha - na bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śūnyatā sākṣātkartavyeti /
S06bsu049_u:7507: kathaṃ bhagavan tasmin samādhau sthito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyatāṃ na sākṣātkaroti?
S06bsu049_u:7508: bhagavānāha - yataḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākāravaropetāṃ śūnyatāṃ pratyavekṣate,
S06bsu049_u:7514: asamāhita evārambaṇe cittamupanibadhnāti - prajñāpāramitā ca me parigṛhītā bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:7516: atrāntarā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na parihīyate bodhipakṣairdharmaiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7519: yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyatāsamādhivimokṣamukhena viharati,
S06bsu049_u:7520: tasmin samaye bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ānimittena ca samādhinā vihartavyam,
S06bsu049_u:7523: evamārūḍhakuśalamūladharmasamanvāgato hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ - paripākasyāyaṃ kālaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7525: prajñāpāramitayā ca parigṛhīto bhūtakoṭiṃ na sākṣātkaroti /
S06bsu049_u:7526: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣaḥ paramaśūraś ca bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:7545: supariniṣpannatayā sarveṣveva ca śilpasthāneṣu paramagatiko bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:7558: bahujanasya ca priyo manaāpaś ca bhavet /
S06bsu049_u:7563: tena mahālābhena samanvāgataḥ san bahujanaṃ saṃvibhajet,
S06bsu049_u:7568: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa puruṣastatonidānaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā āttamanasko bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:7573_0: bhagavānāha - sa khalu punaḥ subhūte puruṣastayā mahāsaṃpattyā samanvāgato mātāpitṛputradārān
S06bsu049_u:7573_1: gṛhītvā kenacideva kāraṇasāmagrīyogena mahāṭavīkāntāraṃ pratipanno bhavet mahāpratibhayaṃ
S06bsu049_u:7574: sa tatra praviṣṭaḥ saṃstān mātāpitṛputradārānabhayenābhinimantrayet - mā bhaiṣṭa,
S06bsu049_u:7578: tatra khalu punaḥ subhūte aṭavīkāntāre tasya puruṣasya bahavaḥ pratyarthikāḥ bahavaḥ pratyamitrāḥ pratyupasthitā bhaveyuḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7579_0: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa śūraḥ puruṣastaiḥ pratyarthikaiḥ pratyamitrairabhyutthitairavinivartyo
S06bsu049_u:7583: ādhyātmikaś ca bāhyaś ca balavān saṃbhāraḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7584_0: tasya tatra aṭavīkāntāre bahutarakāś ca śūratarakarāś ca dṛḍhapraharaṇatarakarāś
S06bsu049_u:7584_1: ca teṣāṃ pratyarthikānāṃ pratyamitrāṇāmanye udāratarakāḥ pratyarthikāḥ pratyamitrāstiṣṭhanti rakṣanti /
S06bsu049_u:7585: te tasya pratyarthikāḥ pratyamitrā avatāraprekṣiṇo 'vatāragaveṣiṇo 'vatāraṃ na lapsyante /
S06bsu049_u:7586_1: ca tato mahābhayabhairavādaṭavīkāntārācchaktaḥ kṣemeṇa svastinā śīghramapakrāmayituṃ
S06bsu049_u:7586_2: yāvadgrāmaṃ vā nagaraṃ vā nigamaṃ vā anuprāptaḥ syāt //
S06bsu049_u:7587_0: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06bsu049_u:7587_1: sarvasattvahitānukampī maitrīvihārī karuṇāvihārī muditāvihārī upekṣāvihārī upāyakauśalyena
S06bsu049_u:7587_2: prajñāpāramitayā ca parigṛhītaḥ kuśalamūlāni samyagbuddhānujñātayā pariṇāmanayā pariṇāmya
S06bsu049_u:7591: tathā hyasya balavattamā dṛḍhatamāś ca parigrāhakāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7594: tenaiṣa pratibalaḥ svastinā kṣemeṇa anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum /
S06bsu049_u:7595: yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānāmantike maitrīcittamārambaṇīkṛtya tān paramayā maitryā paribadhnāti,
S06bsu049_u:7596: atrāntare bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kleśapakṣaṃ mārapakṣaṃ cātikramya śrāvakabhūmiṃ pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ cātikramya tatra samādhāvavatiṣṭhate /
S06bsu049_u:7597: aprāptaś ca sa subhūte āsravakṣayaṃ paramapāramitāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ parijayaṃ karoti /
S06bsu049_u:7598: yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyatāsamādhivimokṣamukhena viharati,
S06bsu049_u:7599: atrāntare bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na cedānīṃ nānimittena samādhinā viharati /
S06bsu049_u:7600: na cānena ānimittaḥ samādhiḥ sākṣātkṛto [Vaidya_185] bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:7601: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte pakṣī śakunirākāśe 'ntarīkṣe carati,
S06bsu049_u:7605: na ca tatrāpi niśrito na pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7606: evameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyatāvihāreṇa viharati,
S06bsu049_u:7612: na ca śūnyatāyāṃ vā ānimitte vā apraṇihite vā patatyaparipūrṇairbuddhadharmaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7613: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte balavāniṣvastrācārya iṣvastraśikṣāyāṃ suśikṣitaḥ supariniṣṭhitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7615: ūrdhvaṃ kāṇḍaṃ kṣiptvā tadanyaiḥ kāṇḍaistatkāṇḍaṃ bhūmau patat pratinivārayet,
S06bsu049_u:7617: tasya paurvakasya kāṇḍasya kāṇḍaparaṃparayā bhūmau patanaṃ na dadyāt,
S06bsu049_u:7619: yāvannākāṅkṣet - aho batedaṃ kāṇḍaṃ bhūmau patediti /
S06bsu049_u:7620: evameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran upāyakauśalyaparigṛhītaḥ tāvattāṃ paramāṃ bhūtakoṭiṃ na sākṣātkaroti,
S06bsu049_u:7621: yāvanna tāni kuśalamūlānyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripakvāni suparipakvāni /
S06bsu049_u:7622: yadā tāni kuśalamūlānyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripakvāni bhavanti suparipakvāni,
S06bsu049_u:7624: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatā evameteṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ gambhīradharmatā pratyavekṣitavyā upanidhyātavyā,
S06bsu049_u:7626: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - duṣkarakārako bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7634: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametatsubhūte, evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:7636: paramaduṣkarakārako bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ yaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu049_u:7641: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvasattvā aparityaktāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7642: tasyeme evaṃrūpāḥ praṇidhānaviśeṣā bhavanti - mayaite sarvasattvāḥ parimocayitavyā iti /
S06bsu049_u:7643: yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ cittamabhinirharati - sarvasattvā mamāparityaktāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7648: tadā upāyakauśalyasamanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ - nāyamantarā bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkariṣyatyaparipūrṇairbuddhadharmaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7651: sa caivāsya cittotpādo yattasya sarvasattvā aparityaktāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7652: sa evamanena cittotpādenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgato 'ntarā bhūtakoṭiṃ na sākṣātkaroti //
S06bsu049_u:7653: punaraparaṃ subhūte yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāni gambhīrāṇi sthānāni pratyavekṣate,
S06bsu049_u:7654: pratyavekṣitukāmo vā bhavati - tadyathā śūnyatāṃ samādhivimokṣamukham,
S06bsu049_u:7657: tenaivaṃ cittamabhinirhartavyam - dīrgharātramamī sattvāḥ sattvasaṃjñayā upalambhe caranti /
S06bsu049_u:7665: evaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena cittotpādena anena copāyakauśalyena samanvāgato nāntarā bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti,
S06bsu049_u:7666: na ca parihīyate maitrīsamādhito na karuṇāmuditopekṣāsamādhitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7668: upāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhūyasyā mātrayā vivardhate śuklairdharmaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7671: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhavati - dīrgharātramamī sattvā dharmasaṃjñayā upalambhe caranti /
S06bsu049_u:7673: so 'nena cittotpādena paurvakeṇa copāyakauśalyena samanvāgataḥ śūnyatāṃ samādhivimokṣamukhaṃ samāpadyate /
S06bsu049_u:7677: upāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhūyasyā mātrayā vivardhate śūklairdharmaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7680: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhavati - dīrgharātramamī sattvā nimittasaṃjñayā nimitte caranti /
S06bsu049_u:7681: teṣāṃ nimittasaṃjñāprahāṇāya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti /
S06bsu049_u:7682: sa ānimittaṃ samādhivimokṣamukhaṃ samāpadyate sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7683: so 'nena cittotpādena paurvakeṇa copāyakauśalyena samanvāgataḥ ānimittaṃ samādhivimokṣamukhaṃ samāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:7685: na ca parihīyate maitryāḥ karuṇāyā muditāyā upekṣāyāḥ sarvasamādhitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7687: upāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhūyasyā mātrayā vivardhate śūklairdharmaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7690: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhavati - dīrgharātramamī sattvā nityasaṃjñayā sukhasaṃjñayā ātmasaṃjñayā śubhasaṃjñayā ca viparyastāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7691_0: tathā kariṣyāmi yathā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya nityasaṃjñāyāḥ sukhasaṃjñāyāḥ
S06bsu049_u:7691_1: ātmasaṃjñāyāḥ śubhasaṃjñāyā viparyāsasya prahāṇāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmi - anityametatsarvaṃ na nityamiti /
S06bsu049_u:7695: so 'nena cittotpādena samanvāgataḥ paurvakeṇa copāyakauśalyena prajñāpāramitayā ca parigṛhīto nāntarā bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti [Vaidya_187] aparipūrṇeṣu buddhadharmeṣu /
S06bsu049_u:7698: na ca parihīyate maitrīto vā karuṇāto vā muditāto vā upekṣāto vā /
S06bsu049_u:7700: upāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhūyasyā mātrayā vivardhate śūklairdharmaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7703: yo hi kaścitsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ cittotpādamutpādayati,
S06bsu049_u:7704: ityapīme sattvā dīrgharātramupalambhe caritāvinaḥ etarhyupalambhe caranti /
S06bsu049_u:7705: nimittasaṃjñāyāṃ caritāvinaḥ etarhy api nimittasaṃjñāyāṃ caranti /
S06bsu049_u:7706: viparyāse caritāvinaḥ etarhy api viparyāse caranti /
S06bsu049_u:7707: piṇḍasaṃjñāyāṃ caritāvinaḥ etarhy api piṇḍasaṃjñāyāṃ caranti /
S06bsu049_u:7708: abhūtasaṃjñāyāṃ caritāvinaḥ etarhy api abhūtasaṃjñāyāṃ caranti /
S06bsu049_u:7709: mithyādṛṣṭau caritāvinaḥ etarhy api mithyādṛṣṭau caranti /
S06bsu049_u:7710: tathā kariṣyāmi yathaiṣāmete doṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:7713_0: evaṃ ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena smṛtisamanvāhāreṇa anena cittotpādena samanvāgataḥ
S06bsu049_u:7713_1: upāyakauśalyena ca samanvāgataḥ prajñāpāramitayā ca parigṛhītaḥ evameteṣāṃ gambhīrāṇāṃ
S06bsu049_u:7713_2: dharmāṇāṃ dharmatāṃ pratyavekṣamāṇaḥ śūnyatāto vā ānimittato vā apraṇihitato vā anabhisaṃskārato
S06bsu049_u:7713_3: vā anutpādato vā ajātito vā abhāvato vā /
S06bsu049_u:7715: yatsa bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ jñānasamanvāgato 'nabhisaṃskāre vā patet,
S06bsu049_u:7718: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paripraṣṭavyo bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena - katameṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ parijayaḥ kartavyaḥ?
S06bsu049_u:7720: yāni cittānyabhinirharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na śūnyatāṃ sākṣātkaroti,
S06bsu049_u:7728: sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vyākaroti - śūnyataiva bodhisattvena mahāsattvena manasi kartavyā /
S06bsu049_u:7729: ānimittameva apraṇihitameva anabhisaṃskāra eva anutpāda eva ajātireva abhāva eva bodhisattvena mahāsattvena manasi kartavya iti /
S06bsu049_u:7732: veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ vyākṛto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvavinivartanīyatve taiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7743: subhūtirāha - syātpunarbhagavan paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo [Vaidya_188] bhavet?
S06bsu049_u:7744: bhagavānāha - syātsubhūte sa paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo bhavet /
S06bsu049_u:7745: sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā vā aśrutvā va evaṃ pratipadyeta,
