S06bsu049_u:8321: āha - kiṃ punarbhagavan śūnyatāyāṃ sa kaściddharma upalabhyate yaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām?
S06bsu049_u:8323: āha - kiṃ punarbhagavan śūnyatā carati śūnyatāyām?
S06bsu049_u:8325: āha - kiṃ punarbhagavan rūpaṃ carati prajñāpāramitāyām?
S06bsu049_u:8327: āha - kiṃ punarbhagavan vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8330: āha - kiṃ punarbhagavan anyatra rūpātsa dharmaḥ kaścidupalabhyate,
S06bsu049_u:8333: āha - kiṃ punarbhagavan anyatra vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārebhyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8337: subhūtirāha - kathaṃ punarbhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām?
S06bsu049_u:8338: evamukte - bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kiṃ punaḥ subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ yaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām?
S06bsu049_u:8340: bhagavānāha - samanupaśyasi tvaṃ subhūte tāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yatra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati?
S06bsu049_u:8342: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yo dharmo 'nupalambhaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8344: api nu sa eva dharma utpanno vā utpatsyate vā utpadyate vā,
S06bsu049_u:8345: niruddho vā nirotsyate vā nirudhyate vā?
S06bsu049_u:8347: bhagavānāha - evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntirevaṃrūpā bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:8348: evaṃrūpayā ca subhūte kṣāntyā samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākriyate 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:8349_0: iyaṃ subhūte tathāgatasya vaiśāradyapratipad yāṃ pratipadyamāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06bsu049_u:8349_1: evaṃ caran evaṃ ghaṭamānaḥ evaṃ vyāyacchamāno 'nuttaraṃ buddhajñānaṃ sarvajñajñānaṃ
S06bsu049_u:8353: subhūtirāha - kathamasyedānīṃ bhagavan dharmasya vyākaraṇaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
S06bsu049_u:8354: bhagavānāha - kiṃ punaḥ subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ yasya dharmasya vyākaraṇaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
S06bsu049_u:8356: nāhaṃ bhagavaṃstaṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yo dharmo vyākṛto vyākariṣyate vyākriyate vā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:8362: sarvadharmeṣu bhagavan anupalabhyamāneṣu na me evaṃ bhavati - ayaṃ dharmo 'bhisaṃbudhyate,
S06bsu049_u:8369: tena khalu punaḥ samayena śakro devānāmindrastasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatitaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇo 'bhūt /
S06bsu049_u:8370: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - gambhīreyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:8372: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - evametatkauśika, evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:8378: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - na te bhagavan sattvā avarakeṇa kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:8379: śrutvā ca udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:8380: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - evametatkauśika, evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:8381: na te kauśika sattvā avarakeṇa kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:8383: śrutvā codgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:8386: tatkiṃ manyase kauśika api nu te sattvāstatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasaveyuḥ?
S06bsu049_u:8389: bhagavānāha - ataḥ khalu punaḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
S06bsu049_u:8391: śrutvā ca udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati likhiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:8392: asya kauśika puṇyaskandhasya asau paurvakāṇāṃ jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ śīlamayaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti /
S06bsu049_u:8393: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti /
S06bsu049_u:8394: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api upaniṣadam api na kṣamate,
S06bsu049_u:8395: yena kuśalamūlena sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā samanvāgato bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:8397: śrutvā codgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati likhiṣyati //
S06bsu049_u:8398: atha khalvanyataro bhikṣuḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - abhibhūto 'si kauśika tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:8399: śrutvā codgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati likhiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:8400: evamukte śakro devānāmindrastaṃ bhikṣumetadavocat - ekacittotpādenaiva ahamārya tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā abhibhūtaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8401: kaḥ punarvādo ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:8402: śrutvā ca udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati [Vaidya_204] deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati likhiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:8403: kaḥ punarvādo ye śrutvā udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya likhitvā tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante,
S06bsu049_u:8406: te sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokamabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8407: na kevalaṃ te sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokamabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:8409: tān api te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8410: na kevalaṃ srotaāpannān sakṛdāgāmino 'nāgāmino 'rhataḥ pratyekabuddhānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:8411: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahādānapatayaḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8412: tān api te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8413: na kevalaṃ tān mahādānapatīn bodhisattvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:8414_0: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā pariśuddhaśīlā akhaṇḍena śīlaskandhenācchidreṇākalmaṣeṇa
S06bsu049_u:8414_1: paripūrṇena pariśuddhena aśabalena śīlaskandhena samanvāgatāḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8415: tān api te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8416: na kevalamakhaṇḍenācchidreṇākalmaṣeṇa paripūrṇena pariśuddhena aśabalena śīlaskandhena samanvāgatān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:8417: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kṣāntisaṃpannā upaśamasaṃpannā apratihatacittā antato dagdhasthūṇāyāmapyāghātacittaṃ notpādayanti prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8418: tān api te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8420: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ārabdhavīryā anikṣiptadhurā akusīdā anavalīnakāyavāṅmanaḥkarmāntāḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8421: tān api te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8423: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dhyānārāmā dhyānaratā dhyānabalino dhyānabalavanto dhyānapratiṣṭhitā dhyānavaśinaḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8424: tān api te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8425: yathānirdiṣṭāyāṃ hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsuralokaṃ sarvān śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikānanupāyakuśalāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvānabhibhavati,
S06bsu049_u:8428: yo hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yathānirdiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu049_u:8430: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñavaṃśasyānupacchedāya sthito bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:8432: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ pratipadyamāno nacirādgamiṣyati bodhimaṇḍam /
S06bsu049_u:8433: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ sattvān kleśapaṅke saṃsīdamānānuddhariṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:8434: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:8437_0: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ [Vaidya_205] catvāro
S06bsu049_u:8437_1: lokapālā mahārājāna upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyanti - kṣipraṃ tvaṃ kulaputra asyāṃ bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣasva,
S06bsu049_u:8439: imāni te catvāri pātrāṇi yāni tvayā bodhimaṇḍe niṣadya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhena pratigrahītavyānīti /
S06bsu049_u:8440: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ yathānirdiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na kevalaṃ catvāro lokapālā mahārājāna upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante,
S06bsu049_u:8443: tathāgatair api so 'rhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairnityameva samanvāhṛto bhaviṣyati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8444: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yāni kānicillaukikāni duḥkhāni paropakramikāṇi vā anyāni vā utpadyeran,
S06bsu049_u:8445: tānyasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ notpatsyante /
S06bsu049_u:8446: ayam api bhagavan dṛṣṭadhārmiko guṇastasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bhavati //
S06bsu049_u:8447: atha khalvāyuṣmata ānandasyaitadabhavat - kimayaṃ śakro devānāmindraḥ svakena pratibhānena bhāṣate,
S06bsu049_u:8449: atha khalu buddhānubhāvena śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmata ānandasya cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - buddhānubhāvo 'yamāryānanda veditavyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8453: evam etat yathā śakreṇa devānāmindreṇa bhāṣitam /
S06bsu049_u:8461: atha khalu bhagavān punarapyāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma - yasmin khalu punarānanda samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:8464: tasmin ānanda samaye ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8465: te sarve saṃśayitā bhavanti - kimayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ntarā bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkariṣyati śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā,
S06bsu049_u:8467: punaraparamānanda tasmin samaye mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ śokaśalyaviddhā bhavanti yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharati /
S06bsu049_u:8468: punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu049_u:8471: tasmin samaye mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya viheṭhāmupasaṃharanti,
S06bsu049_u:8474: digdāhānupadarśayanti - apyeva nāma ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'valīyeta vā romaharṣo vā asya bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:8476: tatra ānanda na sarvasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8479: ānanda āha - kiyadrūpasya bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya upasaṃkrāmati māraḥ pāpīyān viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ?
S06bsu049_u:8480: bhagavānāha - yena ānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvāntataḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāmadhimukticittaṃ notpāditaṃ bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:8481: asya ānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8483: punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ saṃśayaprāpto bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:8486: asyāpyānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8488: punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kalyāṇamitravirahito bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:8490: sa gambhīrāṇi gambhīrāṇi sthānāni prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ na śṛṇoti,
S06bsu049_u:8493: asyāpyānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8495: punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'saddharmaparigrāhakamālīno bhavati - eṣa mama sahāyakaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8497: bahavo 'pi bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mamānye 'pi sahāyakāḥ santi /
S06bsu049_u:8499: ayaṃ tu mayā pratirūpaḥ sahāyo labdhaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8501: asyāpyānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8503: [Vaidya_207] punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'syāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāmanyaṃ bodhisattvamevaṃ vadet - gambhīrā bateyaṃ prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:8505: na hyevamatra yujyamānamanyeṣu sūtrānteṣu yathā tathāgatena bhāṣitam /
S06bsu049_u:8509: asyāpyānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8511: punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyān bodhisattvānavamanyate - ahaṃ vivekavihāreṇa viharāmi,
S06bsu049_u:8514: tasminnānanda samaye māraḥ pāpīyāṃstuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:8518: punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmagrahaṇaṃ vā gotragrahaṇaṃ vā dhutaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ vā bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:8519: evaṃ sa tāvanmātrakeṇa tato 'nyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān peśalān kalyāṇadharmaṇo 'vamanyate /
S06bsu049_u:8520: te ca tasya guṇā na saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:8521: ye 'vinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāṃ guṇāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8522: te ākārāstāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni tasya na saṃvidyante /
S06bsu049_u:8525: parān paṃsayati - na khalvete teṣu dharmeṣu saṃdṛśyante,
S06bsu049_u:8527: tatra mārāṇāṃ pāpīyasāmevaṃ bhavati - na śūnyāni mārabhavanāni bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:8529: mahānirayāstiryañcaḥ pretaviṣayā āsurāś ca kāyā utsadā bhaviṣyantīti /
S06bsu049_u:8531: yathā te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā evaṃ pravṛttā adhyākrāntā lābhasatkāreṇa bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:8534: teṣāṃ ca sa mahājanaḥ śrotavyaṃ śraddhātavyaṃ maṃsyate /
S06bsu049_u:8539: evaṃ te na tathatāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā na tathatāyāṃ pratipadyamānā na tathatāyāṃ yogamāpadyamānāḥ saṃkleśaṃ vivardhayiṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:8540: evaṃ te viparyastayā cittasaṃtatyā yadyadeva karma ārapsyante kāyena vā vācā vā manasā vā,
S06bsu049_u:8545: imamapyānanda arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan māraḥ pāpīyāṃstuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhavati //
S06bsu049_u:8546: punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahāyati vivadati vigṛhṇīte ākrośet paribhāṣeta vyāpadyeta doṣamutpādayati,
S06bsu049_u:8547: tasmin [Vaidya_208] samaye mārasya pāpīyasa evaṃ bhavati - dūrīkariṣyati batāyaṃ kulaputraḥ sarvajñatām,
S06bsu049_u:8548_0: atidūre sthāsyati sarvajñatāyāḥ sacetpunarbodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo 'nyena bodhisattvayānikena
S06bsu049_u:8548_1: pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahāyati vivadati vigṛhṇīte ākrośati paribhāṣate vyāpadyate doṣamutpādayati,
S06bsu049_u:8549: tatra māraḥ pāpīyān bhūyasyā mātrayā tuṣṭo bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:8551: evaṃ cāsya bhavati - ubhāvapyetau bodhisattvau dūre sthāsyataḥ sarvajñatāyā iti //
S06bsu049_u:8552: punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākṛto 'vyākṛtena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdhaṃ kalahāyet vivadet vigṛhṇīyāt ākrośet paribhāṣeta vyāpadyeta doṣamutpādayet,
S06bsu049_u:8554: tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena cittotpāde tāvata eva kalpān saṃnāhaḥ saṃnāhyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8556: evamukte āyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - asti bhagavaṃsteṣāṃ cittotpādānāṃ kiṃcinniḥsaraṇam,
S06bsu049_u:8557: utāho tāvata eva kalpānavaśyaṃ tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena saṃnāhaḥ saṃnahyaḥ?
S06bsu049_u:8558: bhagavānāha - saniḥsaraṇamānanda mayā dharmo deśitaḥ śrāvakayānikānāṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ ca pudgalānām /
S06bsu049_u:8559: tatra ānanda yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo bodhisattvayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahāyitvā vivaditvā vigṛhya ākruśya paribhāṣya vyāpadya doṣamutpādya na pratideśayati,
S06bsu049_u:8564: avaśyaṃ tena ānanda pudgalena punareva tāvata eva kalpān saṃnāhaḥ saṃnahyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8565: yaḥ punarānanda bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo bodhisattvayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahāyitvā vivaditvā vigṛhya ākruśya paribhāṣya vyāpadya doṣamutpādya pratideśayati,
S06bsu049_u:8567: evaṃ ca cittamutpādayati - yena mayā sarvasattvānāṃ vigrahā vivādā virodhā utsārayitavyā nidhyāpayitavyāḥ praśamayitavyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8572: so 'haṃ pareṣu tvamity api vācaṃ bhāṣe,
S06bsu049_u:8573: paruṣaṃ vā karkaśaṃ vā prativaco dadāmi /
S06bsu049_u:8576: parato duruktāni durāgatāni durbhāṣitāni bhāṣyamāṇāni śṛṇvatā cittaṃ nāghātayitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:8581: yadahaṃ pareṣa doṣāntaram api śrotavyaṃ manye /
S06bsu049_u:8587: na ca mayā svaparāddheṣv api pareṣu vyāpattavyam /
S06bsu049_u:8591: na ca mayā jīvitāntarāye 'pi kriyamāṇe kṣobhaḥ karaṇīyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8594: evaṃ cānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śrāvakayānikānām api pudgalānāmantike sthātavyam,
S06bsu049_u:8597: kathaṃ cānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena apareṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāmantike sthātavyam?
S06bsu049_u:8599: ete mama bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ śāstāra ityevaṃ sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:8612: evaṃ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya ānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya antarāyo na bhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8618: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kva punarbhagavan śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate?
S06bsu049_u:8619: bhagavānāha - sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣaye śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:8621: evamanutpāde 'nirodhe 'jātau abhāve viveke virāge ākāśe dharmadhātau /
S06bsu049_u:8624: subhūtirāha - kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣaye śikṣamāṇaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyām,
S06bsu049_u:8625: evamanutpāde 'nirodhe 'jātau abhāve viveke virāge ākāśe dharmadhātau nirvāṇe śikṣamāṇaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyām?
S06bsu049_u:8626: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - yatsubhūte evaṃ vadasi - kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣaye śikṣamāṇaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyām /
S06bsu049_u:8627: evamanutpāde 'nirodhe 'jātau abhāve viveke virāge ākāśe dharmadhātau nirvāṇe śikṣamāṇaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyāmiti?
S06bsu049_u:8628: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yā tathāgatasya tathatā yayā tathatayā tathāgatastathāgata iti prabhāvyate,
S06bsu049_u:8634: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yā tathāgatasya tathatā yayā tathatayā tathāgatastathāgata iti prabhāvyate,
S06bsu049_u:8635: api nu sā utpadyate vā nirudhyate vā jāyate vā bhavati vā vibhavati vā vivicyate vā rajyate vā virajyate vā ākāśībhavati vā dharmībhavati vā?
S06bsu049_u:8637: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yā tathāgatasya tathatā yayā tathatayā tathāgatastathāgata iti prabhāvyate,
S06bsu049_u:8640: bhagavānāha - tasmāttarhi subhūte evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ na tathatā kṣīyate ityevaṃ śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:8641: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyām /
S06bsu049_u:8648: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvaśikṣāpāramitāmanuprāpsyati /
S06bsu049_u:8649: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na śakyo māreṇa vā māraparṣadā vā mārakāyikābhirvā devatābhirabhimarditum /
S06bsu049_u:8651: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipraṃ bodhimaṇḍe niṣatsyati /
S06bsu049_u:8652: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svake gocare carati /
S06bsu049_u:8653: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣate nāthakarakeṣu dharmeṣu,
S06bsu049_u:8658: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣate triparivartasya dvādaśākārasya dharmacakrasya pravartanāya /
S06bsu049_u:8659: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadhātuṃ nonīkariṣyāmīti śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:8660: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatavaṃśasyānupacchedāya śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:8661: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'mṛtadhātudvāraṃ vivariṣyāmīti śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:8662: neyaṃ subhūte udārā [Vaidya_211] śikṣā śakyā hīnasattvena śikṣitum /
S06bsu049_u:8663: na hi alpasthāmnā śakyamasyāṃ śikṣāyāṃ śikṣitum /
S06bsu049_u:8670: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na nirayeṣūpapadyate,
S06bsu049_u:8679: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nāndho bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:8701: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na prāṇātipātī bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:8712: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na dīrghāyuṣkeṣu deveṣūpapadyate,
S06bsu049_u:8717: asti hi tasyopāyakauśalyaṃ yenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na dīrghāyuṣkeṣu deveṣūpapadyate /
S06bsu049_u:8718: tatpunaḥ subhūte upāyakauśalyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya katamat?
S06bsu049_u:8721: yathā anyenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānāni ca samāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:8723: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo balapariśuddhiṃ nigacchati,
S06bsu049_u:8727: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - yadā bhagavan sarvadharmā evaṃ prakṛtipariśuddhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8728: tatkatamasya bhagavan dharmasya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo balapariśuddhiṃ nigacchati,
S06bsu049_u:8732: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametatsubhūte, evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:8735: evaṃ subhūte prakṛtipariśuddheṣu sarvadharmeṣu bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya yā asaṃsīdanatā anavalīnatā,
S06bsu049_u:8737: evaṃ subhūte bālapṛthagjanā enān dharmānajānanto 'paśyanto dharmāṇāṃ dharmatāṃ na jānanti,
S06bsu049_u:8739: teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ [Vaidya_212] kṛtaśaḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vyāyacchante,
S06bsu049_u:8741: vayamevamapaśyakān sattvān paśyayiṣyāmaḥ ityatra śikṣāyāṃ śikṣante /
S06bsu049_u:8742: atra śikṣāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā balānyanuprāpnuvanti,
S06bsu049_u:8745: evaṃ śikṣamāṇāḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ cittacaritavispanditāni yathābhūtaṃ prajānanti /
S06bsu049_u:8747: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte alpakāste mahāpṛthivyāṃ pṛthivīpradeśāḥ ye 'pagatapāṣāṇāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8748: yatra suvarṇaṃ vā jātarūpaṃ vā rajataṃ votpadyate /
S06bsu049_u:8751: evameva subhūte alpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:8753: atha khalu bahutarakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:8755: punaraparaṃ subhūte tadyathāpi nāma alpakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:8757: atha khalu bahutarakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:8759: evameva subhūte alpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:8762: atha khalu bahutarakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:8764: punaraparaṃ subhūte tadyathāpi nāma alpakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:8766: atha khalu bahutarakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:8768: evameva subhūte alpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:8770: atha khalu bahutarakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:8772: punaraparaṃ subhūte tadyathāpi nāma alpakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:8774: atha khalu bahutarakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:8776: evameva subhūte alpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:8778: atha khalu bahutarakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:8780: tasmāttarhi subhūte alpakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:8784: [Vaidya_213] tebhyo 'pi subhūte alpatarakebhyastathatvāya pratipadyamānebhyo 'lpatamāste ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyante /
S06bsu049_u:8785: tebhyo 'pi subhūte alpatamebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyamānebhyo 'lpatamāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8787: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ya ete 'lpatamebhyo 'lpatamā avinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8788: teṣu gaṇanāṃ gantukāmena ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S06bsu049_u:8790: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya na khilasahagataṃ cittamutpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:8798: evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvāḥ pāramitā saṃgṛhītā bhavanti,
S06bsu049_u:8802: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte satkāyadṛṣṭau dvāṣaṣṭidṛṣṭigatānyantargatāni bhavanti,
S06bsu049_u:8803: evameva subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tasyāṃ sarvāḥ pāramitā antargatā bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:8804: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣasya jīvitendriye pravartamāne sarvāṇīndriyāṇyantargatāni bhavanti,
S06bsu049_u:8805: evameva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya sarvakuśalā dharmā antargatā bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:8806: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣasya jīvitendriye niruddhe sarvāṇīndriyāṇi niruddhāni bhavanti,
S06bsu049_u:8807: evameva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya ajñāne niruddhe sarve 'kuśalā dharmā niruddhā bhavanti,
S06bsu049_u:8808: sarvāś ca tadanyāḥ pāramitā antargatāḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:8809: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ parigrahītukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:8810: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānāmagratāyāṃ śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:8813: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yāvantastrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvāḥ sattvasaṃgraheṇa saṃgṛhyamāṇāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8815: subhūtirāha - jāmbūdvīpakā eva tāvadbhagavan bahavaḥ sattvā bhavanti,
S06bsu049_u:8816: kaḥ punarvādo ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8817: bhagavānāha - yaḥ subhūte eko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭhaṃstān sarvasattvān cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sarvasukhopadhānaiścopatiṣṭhet,
S06bsu049_u:8818: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvastatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati?
S06bsu049_u:8821: bhagavānāha - ataḥ sa subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
S06bsu049_u:8824: evaṃ mahārthikā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārikā /
S06bsu049_u:8825_0: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena
S06bsu049_u:8825_4: lokadhātau dharmasāṃkathyaṃ kartukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:8826: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ subhūte śikṣamāṇasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāhaṃ tāṃ saṃpattiṃ samanupaśyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:8828: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarbhagavan śrāvakasaṃpattir api tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitā bhavati?
S06bsu049_u:8829: bhagavānāha - śrāvakasaṃpattir api subhūte tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitā bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:8830: na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakasaṃpatyāṃ sthāsyāmīti śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:8836: na ca prativahati - mayāpyete śrāvakaguṇā deśayitavyāḥ prakāśayitavyā iti śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:8837: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya dakṣiṇīyatāṃ gacchati /
S06bsu049_u:8838: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvāṃstato 'nyān dakṣiṇīyān śrāvakapratisaṃyuktān pratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktāṃścābhibhavati,
S06bsu049_u:8840: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na riñcati,
S06bsu049_u:8842: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'parihāṇadharmā aparihāṇadharmeti veditavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8846: sacetpunarasyaivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ sā prajñāpāramitā imāṃ sarvajñatāmāhariṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:8849: atha tām api prajñāpāramitāṃ na saṃjānīte - iyaṃ sā prajñāpāramitā,
S06bsu049_u:8851: evam api subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃjānīte,
S06bsu049_u:8859: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - caranneva tāvadayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānabhibhavati,
S06bsu049_u:8860: kaḥ punarvādo yadā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:8865: spṛhaṇīyāste sattvā ye sattvasārā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante //
S06bsu049_u:8866: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇyabhinirmāya puṣpāṇāmañjaliṃ kṛtvā tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamabhyavākirat,
S06bsu049_u:8867: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣata - yairbodhisattvayānikaiḥ pudgalairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam - anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyāmahe,
S06bsu049_u:8868: abhisaṃbudhya sarvasattvān mahatā saṃsārārṇavenohyamānān same pārime tīre pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāma iti,
S06bsu049_u:8875: yatte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahākaruṇayā samanvāgatā vivarteran anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti /
S06bsu049_u:8876: na me bhagavan ekacittotpādo 'pyutpadyate yatte bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhuṃ saṃprasthitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8878: iti yadbhūyasyā mātrayā praṇidhiṃ janayiṣyantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau imāni saṃsārāvacarāṇi duḥkhāni sattvānāṃ saṃpaśyantaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8880: tayā mahākaruṇayā arthakāmā hitakāmā hi te sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasyānukampakāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8881: ye imairevaṃrūpaiścittotpādaiḥ samanvāgatāḥ kimiti vayaṃ tīrṇāḥ sattvāṃstārayema,
S06bsu049_u:8886: yasteṣāṃ bhagavan prathamayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ cittotpādānanumodate,
S06bsu049_u:8889: kiyatsa bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati?
S06bsu049_u:8890: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta sumeroḥ parvatarājasya palāgreṇa tulyamānasya pramāṇaṃ grahītum,
S06bsu049_u:8891: na tveva kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum /
S06bsu049_u:8892: syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau palāgreṇa tulyamāne pramāṇaṃ grahītum,
S06bsu049_u:8893: na tveva kauśika tasyānumodanāsahagasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum /
S06bsu049_u:8894: syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta sāhasre cūlike lokadhātau tulyamāne palāgreṇa pramāṇaṃ grahītum,
S06bsu049_u:8895: na tveva kauśika tasyānumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum /
S06bsu049_u:8896: syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta [Vaidya_216] dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau palāgreṇa tulyamāne pramāṇaṃ grahītum,
S06bsu049_u:8897: na tveva kauśika tasyānumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum /
S06bsu049_u:8898: syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau tulyamāne palāgreṇa pramāṇaṃ grahītum,
S06bsu049_u:8899: na tveva kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum //
S06bsu049_u:8900: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - mārādhiṣṭhitāste bhagavan sattvā veditavyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8901: ye bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prathamacittotpādamupādāya yāvadanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhānāmevamaprameyamanumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyamiti na śṛṇvanti,
S06bsu049_u:8907: mārabhavanebhyaś ca te bhagavan sattvāścyutā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:8910: mārabhavanavidhvaṃsanakarā hi tairbhagavan ime cittotpādā abhinirhṛtāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8919: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - evametatkauśika, evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:8924: yaiḥ kauśika kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśceme cittopādā anumoditā bodhisattvayānikairvā pratyekabuddhayānikairvā śrāvakayānikairvā,
S06bsu049_u:8929: yaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśceme cittotpādā anumoditā bodhisattvayānikairvā pratyekabuddhayānikairvā śrāvakayānikairvā,
S06bsu049_u:8939: na ca te amanaāpāni rūpāṇi drakṣyanti [NOTE:
S06bsu049_u:8940: Conze translates "nor hear any unpleasant sounds"] /
S06bsu049_u:8941: na ca te amanaāpān gandhān ghrāsyanti /
S06bsu049_u:8942: na ca te amanaāpān rasān paribhokṣyante /
S06bsu049_u:8943: na ca te amanaāpāni spraṣṭavyāni sprakṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:8947_1: sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlānyanumoditāni yair api bhagavaṃśchandamutpādya bodhaye bodhisattvayānikānāṃ
S06bsu049_u:8948: teṣāṃ te cittotpādā [Vaidya_217] vivardhamānā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārakā bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:8953: yena kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ te cittotpādā anumoditāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8954_0: anena kauśika paryāyeṇa tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ
S06bsu049_u:8954_1: tāṃścittotpādānanumodya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlānyanumoditāni bhavanti,
S06bsu049_u:8956: subhūtirāha - kathaṃ ca bhagavan māyopamaṃ cittamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate?
S06bsu049_u:8957: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ māyopamaṃ cittam?
S06bsu049_u:8959: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ māyām?
S06bsu049_u:8961: nāhaṃ bhagavan māyopamaṃ cittaṃ nāpi māyāṃ samanupaśyāmi /
S06bsu049_u:8962: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yanna māyāṃ nāpi māyopamaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyasi,
S06bsu049_u:8963: tatkiṃ tvamanyatra māyāyā māyopamādvā cittāt taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyasi yo dharmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate?
S06bsu049_u:8965: nāhaṃ bhagavan anyatra māyāyā māyopamādvā cittāt taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:8967: so 'haṃ bhagavan anyatra māyāyā māyopamādvā cittāt taṃ dharmasamanuśyan katamaṃ dharmamupadekṣyāmi astīti vā nāstīti vā?
S06bsu049_u:8969: na so 'stīti vā nāstīti vā upaiti /
S06bsu049_u:8973: na hi bhagavan asaṃvidyamāno dharmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
S06bsu049_u:8978: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'tyantaviviktāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate?
S06bsu049_u:8982: tadā kathaṃ bhagavan viviktena viviktamabhisaṃbuddhaṃ bhavati?
S06bsu049_u:8983: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sādhu sādhu subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:8991: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
S06bsu049_u:8997: tathā gambhīre bhagavan arthe carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9002: taṃ cārthaṃ na sākṣātkaroti yaduta śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā //
S06bsu049_u:9006: tathā hi bhagavan sa eva dharmo nopalabhyate yaḥ sākṣātkuryāt,
S06bsu049_u:9009: sacedbhagavan evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati,
S06bsu049_u:9016: āsannā me 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiriti sacedevamati na samanupaśyati,
S06bsu049_u:9018: dūrīkṛtā me śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmirveti sacedasyaivam api na bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:9020: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan ākāśasya naivaṃ bhavati - kasyacidahamāsannaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9024: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati - anuttarāṃ samyaksabodhirmamāsannā,
S06bsu049_u:9025: śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūra iti /
S06bsu049_u:9028: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan māyāpuruṣasya naivaṃ bhavati - māyākāro mamāsannaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9029: yaḥ punaranyo janakāyaḥ saṃnipatitaḥ sa mama dūra iti /
S06bsu049_u:9032: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati - anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirmamāsannā,
S06bsu049_u:9033: śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūra iti /
S06bsu049_u:9036: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan pratibhāsasya naivaṃ bhavati - yenārambaṇena pratibhāsa utpadyate tanmamāsanne,
S06bsu049_u:9037: ye tu khalu punaratra nopasaṃkrāntā ādarśe vā udakapātre vā te mama dūra iti /
S06bsu049_u:9040: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati - anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirmamāsannā,
S06bsu049_u:9041: śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūra iti /
S06bsu049_u:9044: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃstathāgatasya kaścitpriyo vā apriyo vā na saṃvidyate,
S06bsu049_u:9047: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na kaścitpriyo vā apriyo vā saṃvidyate /
S06bsu049_u:9052: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena yo nirmitako nirmitaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9053: na tasyaivaṃ bhavati - śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūre,
S06bsu049_u:9057: evameva bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati - śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūre,
S06bsu049_u:9061: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan sa nirmitako yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśo nirmitaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9066: evameva bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśa imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
S06bsu049_u:9071: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan dakṣeṇa palagaṇḍena vā palagaṇḍāntevāsinā vā dārumayī strī vā puruṣo vā yantrayuktaḥ kṛto bhavet /
S06bsu049_u:9077: evameva bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśa imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
S06bsu049_u:9086: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sāre batāyamāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati,
S06bsu049_u:9088: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - sāre batāyamāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati,
S06bsu049_u:9090: atha khalu saṃbahulānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devaputrasahasrāṇāmetadabhavat - namaskartavyāste sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9095: anenāpi paryāyeṇa duṣkarakārakā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā veditavyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9098_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtisteṣāṃ saṃbahulānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devaputrasahasrāṇāṃ cetasaiva
S06bsu049_u:9098_1: cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya tāni saṃbahulāni kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇyāmantrayante
S06bsu049_u:9098_2: sma - nedaṃ devaputrāsteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ duṣkaram,
S06bsu049_u:9100: idaṃ tu devaputrāsteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ duṣkaraṃ caiva paramaduṣkaraṃ caiva,
S06bsu049_u:9101: yadaprameyānasaṃkhyeyānapramāṇān sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāma iti saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyante /
S06bsu049_u:9102: te ca sattvā atyantatayā na saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:9106: evaṃ ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhuṃ saṃprasthitāḥ sattvān vineṣyāma iti,
S06bsu049_u:9107: ākāśaṃ sa devaputrā vinetavyaṃ manyeta yaḥ sattvān vinetavyān manyeta /
S06bsu049_u:9110: anena devaputrāḥ paryāyeṇa duṣkarakārakā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9112: ākāśena na sa devaputrāḥ sārdhaṃ veditavyaṃ manyeta,
S06bsu049_u:9113: yaḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnaddhavyaṃ manyeta /
S06bsu049_u:9114: ayaṃ ca saṃnāho bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9118: sacedatraivaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati,
S06bsu049_u:9126: evaṃ devaputrāḥ sarvadharmaviviktatāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati /
S06bsu049_u:9129: atha khalu bhagavān jānanneva āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kiṃ kāraṇaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ sarvadharmaviviktatāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ na saṃsīdati?
S06bsu049_u:9131: anena bhagavan kāranena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmaviviktatāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ na saṃsīdati /
S06bsu049_u:9139: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte sacedevaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe deśyamāne nirdiśyamāne evamupadiśyamāne bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati na viṣīdati na viṣādamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:9149: evaṃ carantaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ sendrakā devāḥ sabrahmakāḥ saprajāpatikāḥ seśānāḥ sarṣinaranārīgaṇā ārātprāñjalībhūtā namasyanti /
S06bsu049_u:9150: bhagavānāha - na kevalaṃ subhūte evaṃ carantaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ sendrakā devāḥ sabrahmakāḥ saprajāpatikāḥ seśānāḥ sarṣinaranārīgaṇā ārātprāñjalībhūtā namasyanti,
S06bsu049_u:9151_0: ye 'pi te subhūte brahmakāyikā devā brahmapurohitā brahmapārṣadyā mahābrahmāṇaḥ parīttābhā
S06bsu049_u:9151_1: apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā
S06bsu049_u:9151_2: bṛhatphalā asaṃjñisattvā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhāś ca devāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9152: te 'pi subhūte taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ evaṃ carantaṃ namasyanti /
S06bsu049_u:9153: ye 'pi te subhūte aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā etarhi tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:9154: te 'pi buddhā bhagavantaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāmevaṃ carantaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ buddhacakṣuṣā paśyanti /
S06bsu049_u:9155: te ca subhūte bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantamanugṛhṇanti,
S06bsu049_u:9157: ye ca khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantastathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanugṛhyante samanvāhriyante,
S06bsu049_u:9158: te te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avinivartanīyā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9159: na ca teṣāmantarāyā utpatsyante mārato vā anyato vā /
S06bsu049_u:9163: ekaikaś ca māraḥ pāpīyāṃstāvatīreva mārasenā abhinirmimīte /
S06bsu049_u:9164: te 'pi subhūte mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsastasya buddhasamanvāhṛtasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato na pratibalā antarāyaṃ kartumanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9165: tiṣṭhantu khalu punaḥ subhūte trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvā mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9166: yāvanta subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9168: ekaikaś ca māraḥ pāpīyāṃstāvatīreva mārasenā abhinirmimīte,
S06bsu049_u:9169: te 'pi subhūte mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsastasya buddhasamanvāhṛtasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato na pratibalā antarāyaṃ kartumanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9170: dvābhyāṃ subhūte dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasmin samaye durdharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhirmārakāyikābhirvā devatābhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9173: sarvadharmāś ca anena śūnyatāto vyavalokitā bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:9174: [Vaidya_222] ābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo durgharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhirmārakāyikābhirvā devatābhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9175: aparābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo durgharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhirmārakāyikābhirvā devatābhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9179: ābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo durgharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhirmārakāyikābhirvā devatābhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9180: evaṃ carataḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya devā apyupasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante /
S06bsu049_u:9184: utsāhaṃ cāsya vardhayiṣyanti - kṣipraṃ tvaṃ kulaputra anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase /
S06bsu049_u:9185: tasmāttarhi kulaputra anenaiva vihāreṇa vihara yaduta prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa /
S06bsu049_u:9187: etenaiva hi tvaṃ kulaputra vihāreṇa viharan anāthānāṃ sattvānāṃ nātho bhaviṣyasi,
S06bsu049_u:9197: evaṃ te devaputrāstasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyotsāhaṃ vardhayiṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:9199: etena hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ye te 'prameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:9200_0: te 'pi bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtā bodhisattvagaṇapuraskṛtāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato viharatastasya
S06bsu049_u:9200_1: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ebhirevaṃrūpairguṇaiḥ samanvāgatasya yaduta prajñāpāramitāviharaṇaguṇaiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9201: buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:9203: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ahametarhi ratnaketorbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya,
S06bsu049_u:9204: śikhino bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpo dharmaṃ deśayāmi,
S06bsu049_u:9205: udānaṃ codānayāmi apareṣāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām,
S06bsu049_u:9206: ya etarhi akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike brahmacaryaṃ caranti /
S06bsu049_u:9207: evameva subhūte te 'pi buddhā bhagavanto ye etarhi iha mama buddhakṣetre bodhisattvā mahāsattvā brahmacaryaṃ caranti,
S06bsu049_u:9209: teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:9211: subhūtirāha - kiṃ sarveṣāmeva bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpāste buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:9214: na subhūte sarveṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpāste buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ [Vaidya_223] deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:9216: kiṃ tarhi subhūte ye te 'vinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvasaṅgavigatāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9217: teṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:9219: subhūtirāha - santi bhagavan avinivartanīyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān sthāpayitvā tato 'nye bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9220: yeṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:9222: bhagavānāha - santi subhūte pratipakṣabalino bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāḥ avinivartanīyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān sthāpayitvā,
S06bsu049_u:9223: yeṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:9226: ye etarhi akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya bodhisattvacaryāmanuśikṣamāṇarūpā bodhisattvacārikāṃ caranti,
S06bsu049_u:9228_0: ime te subhūte bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā avinivartanīyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān
S06bsu049_u:9228_1: sthāpayitvā yeṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ
S06bsu049_u:9230: ye 'pi te subhūte ratnaketorbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhisattvacaryāmanuśikṣamāṇarūpā bodhisattvacaryāṃ caranti,
S06bsu049_u:9232_0: ime 'pi te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avinivartanīyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān
S06bsu049_u:9232_1: sthāpayitvā yeṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ
S06bsu049_u:9234: punaraparaṃ subhūte ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaḥ sarvadharmā anutpattikā ityadhimuñcanti,
S06bsu049_u:9238: anenāpi subhūte vihāreṇa viharatāṃ teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:9240: yeṣāṃ khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:9246_0: yeṣāṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāṃ te buddhā
S06bsu049_u:9246_1: bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ na rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:9249: punaraparaṃ subhūte ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:9253: evametadyathā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bhāṣitamityadhimucya vistareṇa śroṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:9254: evaṃ ca cittamutpādayiṣyanti - [Vaidya_224] imāṃ vayaṃ prajñāpāramitāmakṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādvistareṇa śṛṇuyāmeti,
S06bsu049_u:9255: teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ ye cāsya buddhakṣetre brahmacaryaṃ caranti,
S06bsu049_u:9257: te 'pyenāṃ prajñāpāramitāmadhimucyamānā yathā tathāgatena bhāṣitā tathā cādhimokṣyante,
S06bsu049_u:9259: evaṃ subhūte bahukaraṃ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śravaṇam api vadāmi,
S06bsu049_u:9263: tathatvāya sthitvā tathatvāya pratipadya tiṣṭhanti tathatāyām /
S06bsu049_u:9264: tathatāyāṃ tiṣṭhantaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayanti //
S06bsu049_u:9265: subhūtirāha - yadā bhagavaṃstathatāvinirmukto nānyaḥ kaściddharma upalabhyate,
S06bsu049_u:9266: tadā ko 'yaṃ bhagavan dharmaḥ sthāsyati tathatāyām,
S06bsu049_u:9269: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - yatsubhūte evaṃ vadasi - yadā tathatāvinirmukto nānyaḥ kaściddharma upalabhyate,
S06bsu049_u:9285: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:9289: na ca nāma bhagavan kaściddharmastathatāyāṃ tiṣṭhati,
S06bsu049_u:9295: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - yatkauśika evaṃ vadasi - duṣkarakārakā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9296: yeṣāmevaṃ gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu na bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:9298: sarvadharmeṣu kauśika śūnyeṣu kasyātra kāṅkṣāyitatā vā bhavati dhandhāyitatā vā bhavati?
S06bsu049_u:9302: tadyathāpi nāma antarīkṣe iṣuḥ kṣipto naiva kvacitsajjati,
S06bsu049_u:9304: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - kaccidahaṃ bhagavan subhūtiṃ sthaviramārabhya evaṃ bhāṣamāṇaṃ evaṃ nirdiśaṃstathāgatasyoktavādī bhavāmi dharmavādī ca,
S06bsu049_u:9306: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - yatkhalu [Vaidya_225] tvaṃ kauśika evaṃ bhāṣase - evametatkauśika, evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:9307: evaṃ bhāṣamāṇaṃ evaṃ nirdiśaṃstathāgatasyoktavādī bhavasi dharmavādī ca,
S06bsu049_u:9310: yadyadeva hi kauśika subhūteḥ sthavirasya pratibhāti,
S06bsu049_u:9313: subhūtirhi kauśika sthaviraḥ prajñāpāramitām api tāvanna samanupaśyati,
S06bsu049_u:9332: sarvadharmaviviktavihāreṇa sarvadharmānupalambhavihāreṇa hi kauśika subhūtiḥ sthaviro viharati /
S06bsu049_u:9333: yaḥ khalu punarayaṃ kauśika subhūteḥ sthavirasya sarvadharmaviviktavihāraḥ sarvadharmānupalambhavihāraśca,
S06bsu049_u:9334: eṣa kauśika vihāro bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato viharataḥ śatatamīm api kalaṃ nopaiti /
S06bsu049_u:9335: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti /
S06bsu049_u:9336: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api upaniṣadam api na kṣamate /
S06bsu049_u:9337: tathāgatavihāraṃ hi kauśika sthāpayitvā tato 'nyān sarvān vihārānabhibhavatyayaṃ vihāraḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9338: yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato viharato vihāraḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9351: yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato viharato vihāraḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9352_0: tasmāttarhi kauśika sarvasattvānāmagratāṃ gantukāmena śreṣṭhatāṃ gantukāmena jyeṣṭhatāṃ
S06bsu049_u:9352_1: gantukāmena varatāṃ gantukāmena pravaratāṃ gantukāmena praṇītatāṃ gantukāmena uttamatāṃ
S06bsu049_u:9352_2: gantukāmena anuttamatāṃ gantukāmena niruttaratāṃ gantukāmena asamatāṃ gantukāmena
S06bsu049_u:9352_3: asamasamatāṃ gantukāmena kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā anena vihāreṇa vihartavyam,
S06bsu049_u:9353: yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāṃ viharatāṃ vihāra iti //
S06bsu049_u:9358: atha khalu tasmin samaye 'nyataro devaputrastrāyastriṃśairdevaputraiḥ sārdhaṃ māndāravāṇi mahāmāndāravāṇi ca puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9359: ṣaṣṭhaṃ śataṃ ca bhikṣūṇāṃ tasminneva samaye tasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatitaṃ saṃniṣaṇṇaṃ cābhūt /
S06bsu049_u:9360: te utthāyāsanebhya ekāṃsānyuttarāsaṅgāni kṛtvā dakṣiṇāni jānumaṇḍalāni pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamayāmāsuḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9361: teṣā bhikṣūṇāṃ buddhānubhāvena te 'ñjalipragrahā māndāravamahāmāndāravāṇāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ paripūrṇā abhūvan /
S06bsu049_u:9365: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣanta - vayaṃ bhagavan asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyāmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9366: vayaṃ bhagavan anena anuttareṇa prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa vihāriṣyāma iti //
S06bsu049_u:9367: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ smitaṃ prādurakarot /
S06bsu049_u:9368: dharmatā khalu punareṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām - yadā smitaṃ prāduṣkurvanti,
S06bsu049_u:9369: atha tadā nānāvarṇā anekavarṇā raśmayo bhagavato mukhadvārānniścaranti - tadyathā nīlapītalohitāvadātamāñjiṣṭhasphaṭikarajatasuvarṇavarṇāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9370: te niścarya anantāparyantān lokadhātūnābhayā avabhāsya yāvadbrahmalokamabhyudgamya punareva pratyudāvṛtya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato mūrdhanyantardhīyante //
S06bsu049_u:9371_0: atha khalvāyuṣmānānanda utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
S06bsu049_u:9371_1: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantametadavocat
S06bsu049_u:9371_2: - nāhetukaṃ nāpratyayaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāduṣkurvanti /
S06bsu049_u:9374: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - idamānanda bhikṣūṇāṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ śatamanāgate 'dhvani tārakopame kalpe anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06bsu049_u:9377: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ śāstāro loke bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:9378: teṣāṃ khalu punarānanda avakīrṇakusumanāmnāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ sarveṣāṃ samaḥ śrāvakasaṃgho bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:9379: sarveṣāṃ ca teṣāmavakīrṇakusumanāmnāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ samamevāyuḥpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati viṃśatikalpasahasrāṇi /
S06bsu049_u:9380: sarveṣāmeva caikaikasya vaistārikaṃ pravacanaṃ bhaviṣyati pṛthuvaipulyaprāptaṃ devamanuṣyeṣu /
S06bsu049_u:9383: sarve ca te yato yata eva grāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīto 'bhiniṣkramiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:9385: pravartya ca yatra yatra ca vihariṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:9386: yato yataś ca yatra yatraiva ca pravekṣanti,
S06bsu049_u:9387: yena yena ca yato yata eva cābhiniṣkramiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:9388: tatastatastatra tatra teṣāṃ praviśatāmabhiniṣkrāmatāṃ viharatāṃ ca pañcavarṇikānāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ puṣpavarṣāḥ pravartiṣyante /
S06bsu049_u:9389: tasmāttarhi ānanda bodhisattvairmahāsattvairuttamena vihāreṇa vihartukāmaiḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa [Vaidya_227] vihartavyam /
S06bsu049_u:9391: ye hi kecidānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:9392: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā - manuṣyebhya evaite cyutā bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:9393: te ihopapannāstuṣitebhya eva vā devanikāyebhyaścyutā bhaviṣyanti manuṣyeṣvevopapannāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9395: tathā hi manuṣyeṣu tuṣiteṣu ca deveṣu iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā vistareṇa pracariṣyatīti /
S06bsu049_u:9396: tathāgatāvalokitāḥ khalu punarānanda te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā veditavyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9399: dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti,
S06bsu049_u:9401_0: udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya
S06bsu049_u:9401_1: antaśo likhitvā bodhisattvān mahāsattvānavavadiṣyanti anuśāsiṣyanti saṃdarśayiṣyanti
S06bsu049_u:9402: avaropitakuśalamūlāste ānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvā veditavyāstathāgateṣvarhatsu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu /
S06bsu049_u:9403: na kevalaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāmantike taiḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitum,
S06bsu049_u:9404: niḥsaṃśayaṃ khalu punarānanda tathāgateṣvarhatsu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu taiḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9407: ye ca ānanda enāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca,
S06bsu049_u:9409: niṣṭhā ānanda tatra gantavyā - saṃmukhībhūtāste abhūvan bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmiti /
S06bsu049_u:9418: kiṃcāpyānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantike kuśalamūlamavaropitam,
S06bsu049_u:9419: evaṃ hi tanna śrāvakapratyekabuddhatvāya dāsyati vipākam /
S06bsu049_u:9420: sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau na visaṃvādayiṣyati praṇidhānam,
S06bsu049_u:9421: api tu khalu punarānanda prāyeṇa tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kṛtajñena bhavitavyaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavatā /
S06bsu049_u:9422_0: tasmāttarhi te ānanda parīndāmi anuparīndāmi imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā
S06bsu049_u:9422_1: akṣarasaṃnipātādudgrahaṇāya dhāraṇāya vācanāya paryavāptaye pravartanāya cirasthitaye
S06bsu049_u:9423: sacettvamānanda yo mayā te dharmo deśitaḥ sākṣāt sthāpayitvā prajñāpāramitām,
S06bsu049_u:9426: na me tvamānanda etāvatā aparāddhaḥ syāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9427: yatkhalu punastvamānanda prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ padaṃ vā padasāmantakaṃ vā nāśayeḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9436: na mānito na pūjito nārcito nāpacāyitaḥ syām /
S06bsu049_u:9437: ye 'pi [Vaidya_228] te ānanda atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9438: te 'pi tvayā ānanda na satkṛtā na gurukṛtā na mānitā na pūjitā nārcitā nāpacāyitā bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:9445: uktametadānanda tathāgatena - prajñāpāramitā atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ mātā jananī janayitrī sarvajñatāyā āhāriketi /
S06bsu049_u:9446: tasmāttarhi ānanda parīndāmi anuparīndāmi te imāṃ prajñāpāramitām,
S06bsu049_u:9459: sumanasikṛtā ca sudhṛtā ca suparyavāptā ca supravartitā ca tvayā ānanda iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā kartavyā /
S06bsu049_u:9462: atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ hi ānanda tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ dharmakāyateti tāṃ dharmatāṃ pramāṇīkṛtya /
S06bsu049_u:9463_0: yathā tattvamānanda etarhi me tathāgatasya tiṣṭhato dhriyamāṇasya yāpayato hitaiṣitayā
S06bsu049_u:9463_1: premato vā gauravato vā kalyāṇato vā sparśavihārato vā kartavyaṃ vā dātavyaṃ vā samanvāhartavyaṃ vā manyase,
S06bsu049_u:9464_0: tathaiva tvayā ānanda iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā
S06bsu049_u:9464_1: pravartayitavyā deśayitavyā upadeṣṭavyā uddeṣṭavyā svādhyātavyā likhitavyā bhāvayitavyā
S06bsu049_u:9464_2: satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā arcayitavyā apacāyitavyā,
S06bsu049_u:9465: tayā hitaiṣitayā tena premṇā tena gauraveṇa tayā guṇavattayā /
S06bsu049_u:9466: evaṃ tvayā ānanda ahaṃ pūjito bhavāmi,
S06bsu049_u:9468: atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantike prema ca prasādaś ca gauravaṃ cotpāditaṃ bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:9469: yadi te ānanda ahaṃ priyo manaāpo 'parityaktastathāgataḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9470: tataste ānanda iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā priyā manaāpā aparityajanīyā bhavatu,
S06bsu049_u:9471: yathā te ekapadam api na praṇaśyet,
