S06bsu049_u:9701: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ hi subhūte carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchanti,
S06bsu049_u:9703: tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato yāni kānicinmārakarmāṇyutpadyeran,
S06bsu049_u:9706: sarvopāyakauśalyāni subhūte parigrahītukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam,
S06bsu049_u:9708: yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu049_u:9710: tasmin samaye subhūte na bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ye 'prameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:9712: teṣām api itonirjātaiva sarvajñatā yaduta prajñāpāramitātaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9713: evaṃ samanvāhṛtya tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena punarevaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - ahamapyetān dharmānanuprāpsyāmi ye tairbuddhairbhagavadbhiranuprāptā iti /
S06bsu049_u:9714: evaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā ime cittotpādā utpādayitavyā abhinirhartavyā divasasyātyayena,
S06bsu049_u:9716: yaś ca subhūte aupalambhiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu049_u:9718: yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divasasyātyayena imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmabhinirharet,
S06bsu049_u:9722: yo 'syāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran imāṃścittotpādānutpādayati divasasyātyayena [Vaidya_234] antaśo 'cchaṭāsaṃghātamātrakam api /
S06bsu049_u:9724: tathāgatasamanvāhṛtasya hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kā gatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā?
S06bsu049_u:9725: tathāgatasamanvāhṛtasya hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nānyā gatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā anyatrānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9736: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte gandhahastino bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ya etarhyakṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike brahmacaryaṃ caratīti //
S06bsu049_u:9741: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃ prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā - sarvadharmāsaṅgataḥ prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
S06bsu049_u:9746: sarvadharmāś ca nāmamātreṇa vyavahāramātreṇābhilapyante iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
S06bsu049_u:9747: vyavahāraś ca na kvacinna kutaścinna kaścidvyavahāraḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9748: sarvadharmā avyavahārā avyāhārā avyavahṛtā avyāhṛtā iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
S06bsu049_u:9761: ajānānā ajātā atyantājātita iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
S06bsu049_u:9763: sarvadharmā āryārhantaḥ prakṛtipariśuddhā iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
S06bsu049_u:9769: vijñānaṃ hi subhūte adeśamapradeśaṃ prakṛītisvabhāvataḥ sarvadharmanirodhaprahlādanatvāditi prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
S06bsu049_u:9773: rūpaṃ hi subhūte satattvena svabhāvena na rajyate na virajyate /
S06bsu049_u:9775: vijñānaṃ hi subhūte satattvena svabhāvena na rajyate na virajyate prakṛtipariśuddhatvāditi prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
S06bsu049_u:9776: sarvadharmā asaktāḥ saṅgāsaṅgavigatā iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
S06bsu049_u:9780: sarvadharmā maitrīvihāriṇaḥ karuṇāvihāriṇo muditāvihāriṇa upekṣāvihāriṇa iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
S06bsu049_u:9781: sarvadharmā brahmabhūtā doṣānutpādanataḥ sarvadoṣānutpādanata iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
S06bsu049_u:9889: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā //
S06bsu049_u:9890: yadāyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evamenāṃ prajñāpāramitāmanugamiṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:9891: vyavacārayiṣyati avatariṣyati avabhotsyate cintayiṣyati tulayiṣyati upaparīkṣiṣyate bhāvayiṣyati sarvamāyāśāṭhyavivarjitairmanasikāraiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9902: tadā nāsya durlabhā bhaviṣyati sarvaguṇānāṃ paripūriḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9910: ya etarhi bhīṣmagarjitanirghoṣasvarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike brahmacaryaṃ carati /
S06bsu049_u:9911: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kathaṃ bhagavan sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena mahāsattveneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā paryeṣitā?
S06bsu049_u:9912_0: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sadāpraruditena subhūte bodhisattvena
S06bsu049_u:9912_1: mahāsattvena pūrvaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paryeṣamāṇena kāye 'narthikena jīvitanirapekṣeṇa
S06bsu049_u:9913: tena prajñāpāramitāṃ paryeṣamāṇena araṇyagatena antarīkṣānnirghoṣaḥ śruto 'bhūt - gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra pūrvasyāṃ diśi /
S06bsu049_u:9924: mā ca kvaciccittaṃ praṇidhāḥ adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā /
S06bsu049_u:9936: yathā na vedanāto na saṃjñāto na saṃskārataḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9947: evamukte sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ nirghoṣametadavocat - evaṃ vai kariṣyāmi /
S06bsu049_u:9949: ahaṃ hi sarvasattvānāmālokaṃ kartukāmo buddhadharmān samudānetukāma iti /
S06bsu049_u:9950: evamukte sa nirghoṣaḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kulaputra sadāprarudita //
S06bsu049_u:9951: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punar api śabdamaśrauṣīt /
S06bsu049_u:9952: evaṃ cāśrauṣīt - śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu ca tvayā kulaputra sarvadharmeṣvadhimuktimutpādya prajñāpāramitā paryeṣṭavyā /
S06bsu049_u:9953: nimittaparivarjitena bhāvaparivarjitena sattvadṛṣṭiparivarjitena ca tvayā bhavitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:9955: kalyāṇamitrāṇi ca tvayā sevitavyāni bhaktavyāni paryupāsitavyāni,
S06bsu049_u:9956: yāni ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānutpādājātāniruddhābhāvāḥ sarvadharmā iti dharmaṃ deśayanti /
S06bsu049_u:9957: evaṃ tvaṃ kulaputra pratipadyamāno nacireṇa prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyasi pustakagatāṃ vā dharmabhāṇakasya bhikṣoḥ kāyagatām /
S06bsu049_u:9958: yasya ca tvaṃ kulaputra antikātprajñāpāramitāṃ śṛṇuyāḥ śāstṛsaṃjñā tvayā tatrotpādayitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:9959: kṛtajñena ca tvayā bhavitavyaṃ kṛtavedinā ca - eṣa mama kalyāṇamitraṃ yasyemāṃ prajñāpāramitāmantikācchṛṇomi /
S06bsu049_u:9960: yāmahaṃ śṛṇvan [Vaidya_239] kṣiprameva avinivartanīyo bhaviṣyāmyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9965: imāstvayā kulaputra anuśaṃsāḥ paritulayamānena dharmabhāṇake bhikṣau śāstṛsaṃjñotpādayitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:9966: na ca tvayā kulaputra lokāmiṣapratisaṃyuktayā cittasaṃtatyā dharmabhāṇako bhikṣuranubaddhavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9967: dharmārthikena ca tvayā dharmagauraveṇa dharmabhāṇako bhikṣuranubaddhavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9969: asti hi kulaputra māraḥ pāpīyān dharmabhāṇakasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rūpaśabdagandharasasparśānupasaṃharati sevituṃ bhaktuṃ paryupāsitum /
S06bsu049_u:9971: tatra ca tvayā kulaputra dharmabhāṇake bhikṣau nāprasādacittamutpādayitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:9972: api tvevaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - nāhaṃ tadupāyakauśalyaṃ jāne,
S06bsu049_u:9974: eṣa sattvavinayena sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlaparigrahamupādāya enān dharmān pratisevate bhajate paryupāste /
S06bsu049_u:9975: na hi kvacidbodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ saṅgo vā ārambaṇaṃ vā saṃvidyate /
S06bsu049_u:9976: tatkṣaṇaṃ ca tvayā kulaputra dharmāṇāṃ bhūtanayaḥ pratyavekṣitavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9981: sarvadharmā hi niḥsattvā nirjīvā niṣpoṣā niṣpuruṣā niṣpudgalā māyopamāḥ svapnopamāḥ pratiśrutkopamāḥ pratibhāsopamāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9982: evaṃ tvaṃ kulaputra sarvadharmāṇāṃ bhūtanayaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇo dharmabhāṇakamanubadhnan nacireṇa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ niryāsyasi /
S06bsu049_u:9983: aparam api tvaṃ kulaputra mārakarma samanvāhareḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9986: tatra tvayā kulaputra na prativāṇiḥ kartavyā /
S06bsu049_u:9987: api tu dharmārthikenaiva dharmagauraveṇaiva anirviṇṇamānasena dharmabhāṇako bhikṣuranubaddhavyaḥ //
S06bsu049_u:9988: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasya nirghoṣasyāntikādimāmanuśāsanīṃ pratigṛhya yena pūrvā dik tena pratikrāmati sma /
S06bsu049_u:9989: aciraprakrāntasya cāsyaitadabhūt - na mayā sa nirghoṣaḥ paripṛṣṭaḥ - kiyaddūraṃ mayā gantavyamiti /
S06bsu049_u:9991: tatra rudan krandan śocan paridevamānaḥ evaṃ cintayati sma - asminneva pṛthivīpradeśe ekaṃ vā rātriṃdivamatināmayiṣyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:10007: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣaḥ ekaputrake kālagate mahatā duḥkhadaurmanasyena samanvāgato 'bhavat,
S06bsu049_u:10010: evameva subhūte sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tasmin [Vaidya_240] samaye nānyaḥ kaścinmanasikāraḥ pravartate sma,
S06bsu049_u:10011: api tu kadā nāmāhaṃ tāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyāmīti //
S06bsu049_u:10012: atha khalu subhūte sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tathotkaṇṭhitasya tathāgatavigrahaḥ purataḥ sthitvā sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S06bsu049_u:10014: evaṃ hi kulaputra paurvakair api tathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caradbhiḥ prajñāpāramitā paryeṣitā,
S06bsu049_u:10016: tena hi tvaṃ kulaputra etenaiva vīryeṇa etenaivotsāhenaṃ etayaivārthikatayā etayaiva cchandikatayā anubadhya pūrvāmeva diśaṃ gaccha /
S06bsu049_u:10017: asti kulaputra itaḥ pañcabhiryojanaśatairgandhavatī nāma nagarī saptaratnamayī,
S06bsu049_u:10022_0: ṛddhā ca sphītā ca kṣemā ca subhikṣā ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyā ca pañcabhirantarāpaṇavīthiśatairālekhyavicitrasadṛśairdarśanīyairnirviddhā
S06bsu049_u:10023: samantataḥ prākārāś ca tasyā nagaryāḥ saptaratnamayāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10024: teṣāṃ ca saptaratnamayānāṃ prākārāṇāṃ jāmbūnadasya suvarṇasya khoḍakaśīrṣāṇi pramāṇavantyupodgatāni /
S06bsu049_u:10025: sarvasmiṃś ca khoḍakaśīrṣe saptaratnamayo vṛkṣo jāto nānāvicitrai ratnamayaiḥ phalaiḥ phalavān /
S06bsu049_u:10026: sarvataś ca khoḍakavṛkṣādratnamayaṃ sūtraṃ dvitīyaṃ khoḍakavṛkṣāntaramavasaktam /
S06bsu049_u:10027: sarvāvatī ca sā nagarī sauvarṇena kiṅkiṇījālena praticchannā /
S06bsu049_u:10028: tasya ca kiṅkiṇījālasya vāteneritasya valgurmanojño rañjanīyaḥ śabdo niścarati /
S06bsu049_u:10029: tadyathāpi nāma pañcāṅgikasya tūryasya sametya saṃgītyāṃ kuśalairgandharvaiḥ saṃpravāditasya valgurmanojño rañjanīyo nirghoṣo niścarati,
S06bsu049_u:10030: evameva tasya kiṅkiṇījālasya vāteritasya valgurmanojño rañjanīyo nirghoṣo niścarati /
S06bsu049_u:10031: tena ca śabdena te sattvāḥ krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti /
S06bsu049_u:10032: samantācca tasyā nagaryāḥ parikhā vāriparipūrṇā anusārivārivāhinyo vāriṇo nātiśītasya nātyuṣṇasya pūrṇāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10033: tasmiṃś ca vāriṇi nāvaḥ saptānāṃ ratnānāṃ vicitrā darśanīyāsteṣāmeva sattvānāṃ pūrvakarmavipākenābhinirvṛttāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10034: yāsu te sattvā abhiruhya krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti /
S06bsu049_u:10036: anyaiś ca abhijātābhijātaiḥ sugandhagandhibhiḥ puṣpaiḥ saṃchāditam /
S06bsu049_u:10037: nāsti sā kācittrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau puṣpajātiryā tatra nāsti /
S06bsu049_u:10042: sarvāsu tāsu puṣkariṇīṣu saptaratnamayāni vicitrāṇi darśanīyāni utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkāṇi jātāni,
S06bsu049_u:10044: sarvāṇi ca tānyutpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkāni śakaṭacakrapramāṇapariṇāhāni sugandhāni nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanidarśanāni nīlanirbhāsāni,
S06bsu049_u:10051: yathāpi nāma dīrgharātraṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavatāṃ buddhanetrīcitrīkārānugatasugataśrutacittānāṃ sattvānāṃ dīrgharātraṃ gambhīreṣu dharmeṣvadhimuktānām /
S06bsu049_u:10052: tatra ca kulaputra gandhavatyāṃ nagaryāṃ madhyeśṛṅgāṭakasya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gṛhaṃ yojanaṃ samantāt /
S06bsu049_u:10057: aśokaṃ ca nāma śokavigataṃ ca nāma puṣpacitraṃ ca nāmodyānam /
S06bsu049_u:10058: ekaikasmiṃścodyāne 'ṣṭāvaṣṭau puṣkariṇyo yaduta bhadrā ca nāma,
S06bsu049_u:10066: tāsāṃ ca khalu puṣkariṇīnāmekaṃ pārśvaṃ sauvarṇamayaṃ dvitīyaṃ pārśvaṃ rūpyamayaṃ tṛtīyaṃ pārśvaṃ vaidūryamayaṃ caturthaṃ pārśvaṃ sphaṭikamayam /
S06bsu049_u:10069: ekaikasyāṃ ca puṣkariṇyāmaṣṭāvaṣṭau sopānāni nānāvicitrai ratnamayaiḥ sopānaphalakaiḥ pratimaṇḍitāni /
S06bsu049_u:10070: sarvasmiṃś ca sopānaphalakavivarāntare jāmbūnadasya suvarṇasya kadalīvṛkṣo jātaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10072: samantācca tāsāṃ puṣkariṇīnāṃ nānācitrāḥ puṣpavṛkṣā jātāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10073: teṣāṃ puṣpavṛkṣāṇāṃ vāteneritāni puṣpāṇi puṣkariṇīṣu patanti /
S06bsu049_u:10074: sarvāsu ca tāsu puṣkariṇīṣu candanagandhikaṃ vāri,
S06bsu049_u:10076: tatra ca dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saparivāro 'ṣṭaṣaṣṭayā strīsahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtaḥ krīḍati ramate paricārayati / ye 'pi
S06bsu049_u:10079: te 'pi sarve nityapramuditā udyāneṣu puṣkariṇīṣu ca pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitāḥ samanvaṅgībhūtāḥ krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti /
S06bsu049_u:10080: sa khalu punardharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sārdhaṃ parivāreṇa tāvatkālaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati,
S06bsu049_u:10082: ye 'pi te sattvāstatra gandhavatyāṃ nagaryāṃ vāstavyāḥ te 'pi madhyenagaraśṛṅgāṭakasya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya āsanaṃ prajñapayanti,
S06bsu049_u:10083: suvarṇapādakaṃ vā rūpyapādakaṃ vā vaiḍūryapādakaṃ vā sphaṭikapādakaṃ vā,
S06bsu049_u:10088: upariṣṭāccāntarīkṣe cailavitānaṃ muktāvicitritaṃ samaṃ sahitā niratāḥ kimayaṃ saṃsthita iti susaṃsthitavicitravipākatayā dhārayanti /
S06bsu049_u:10089: samantācca taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ pañcavarṇikaiḥ kusumairabhyavakiranti saṃpravikiranti /
S06bsu049_u:10091: yathāpīdaṃ dharmāśayaviśuddhyā tasya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmagauraveṇa ca /
S06bsu049_u:10092: tatra dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niṣaṇṇaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ deśayati /
S06bsu049_u:10093_0: evaṃrūpeṇa kulaputra dharmagauraveṇa dharmāṇāṃ saṃniśrayatayā [Vaidya_242] śraddheyaśraddadhānatayā
S06bsu049_u:10093_1: śraddhotpādanena te sattvā dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntikātprajñāpāramitāṃ śṛṇvanti /
S06bsu049_u:10094: tatra ca bahūni prāṇiśatāni bahūni prāṇisahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi saṃnipatitāni devamanuṣyāṇāṃ śṛṇvanti /
S06bsu049_u:10099: sarvaṃ ca te sattvā avinipātadharmāṇo 'vinivartanīyā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10100: tasya tvaṃ kulaputra dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntikaṃ gaccha /
S06bsu049_u:10102: sa hi tava kulaputra dīrgharātraṃ kalyāṇamitraṃ saṃdarśakaḥ samādāpakaḥ samuttejakaḥ saṃpraharṣako 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10105: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra rātriṃdivamadhiṣṭhitamanasikāramutpādayamāno nacireṇa prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyasi //
S06bsu049_u:10106: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ idaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭa udagra āttamanaskaḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto 'bhūt /
S06bsu049_u:10107: tadyathāpi nāma puruṣaḥ saviṣeṇa śalyena viddho nānyaṃ manasikāramutpādayati,
S06bsu049_u:10108: api tu kadā nāmāhaṃ śalyahartāraṃ vaidyaṃ lapsye yo mamedaṃ śalyamuddhariṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:10110: evameva sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasmin samaye nānyaṃ kaṃciddharmaṃ manasi karoti,
S06bsu049_u:10111: api tu kadā nāmāhaṃ taṃ kulaputraṃ drakṣyāmi yo māṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrāvayiṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:10112: yanmama dharmaṃ śrutvā upalambhamanasikārāḥ prahāsyanta iti //
S06bsu049_u:10113: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasminneva pṛthivīpradeśe sthitaḥ tasya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāṃ deśayataḥ śṛṇoti sma /
S06bsu049_u:10178: sa eṣu samādhiṣu sthitaḥ san daśadiśi loke buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati sma aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān imāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ prakāśayato bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10179: te ca tathāgatāḥ sādhukāraṃ dadati sma,
S06bsu049_u:10181: evaṃ cāvocan - asmābhir api kulaputra pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caradbhirevameva prajñāpāramitā parigaveṣitā /
S06bsu049_u:10182: parigaveṣamāṇaiś ca ete eva samādhayaḥ pratilabdhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10184: enāṃś ca samādhīn pratilabhya gatiṃgatāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10186: te vayameteṣāmeva samādhīnāṃ prakṛtiṃ svabhāvaṃ vyavalokayantastaṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmo yaḥ samāpadyate vā vyuttiṣṭhate vā,
S06bsu049_u:10197: sarvabuddhadharmaguṇapāramitā ca anuprāptā yasyā guṇapāramitāyā na śakyaṃ tathāgataireva tāvatpramāṇaṃ grahītuṃ paryanto vā nidarśayitum,
S06bsu049_u:10199: tasmāttarhi kulaputra eteṣveva tvayā dharmeṣu gauravamutpādayitavyaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā arthikatayā chandikatayā ca /
S06bsu049_u:10200: arthikasya hi kulaputra chandikasya ca na durlabhā bhavatyanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10201: kalyāṇamitreṣu ca tvayā kulaputra tīvraṃ gauravamutpādayitavyam,
S06bsu049_u:10204: kalyāṇamitraparigṛhītā hi bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kṣiprameva anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante //
S06bsu049_u:10205: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāṃstathāgatānetadavocat - ko 'smākaṃ kalyāṇamitramiti?
S06bsu049_u:10206: ta enametadavocan - dīrgharātraṃ tvaṃ kulaputra dharmodgatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripācitaḥ parigṛhītaś ca /
S06bsu049_u:10208: sa tava kulaputra parigrāhakaḥ kalyāṇamitraṃ ca /
S06bsu049_u:10209: tattvayā kṛtajñatayā kṛtaveditayā ca satkṛtya tatkṛtaṃ dhārayitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:10210_0: sacettvaṃ kulaputra dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ [Vaidya_244] mahāsattvamekaṃ vā kalpaṃ
S06bsu049_u:10210_1: dvau vā kalpau trīn vā kalpān kalpaśataṃ vā kalpasahasraṃ vā kalpaśatasahasraṃ vā
S06bsu049_u:10210_2: tato vā uttare cailoṇḍukamiva śirasā parikarṣeḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10214: evam api tvayā kulaputra tasya kulaputrasya naiva kṛtasya pratikṛtaṃ bhavet /
S06bsu049_u:10216: tasya hi kulaputra kulaputrasya anubhāvena tavaiṣāmevaṃrūpāṇāṃ samādhīnāṃ pratilambhaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10218: atha khalu te tathāgatāḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samāśvāsya antarhitā abhūvan /
S06bsu049_u:10223: tasyaitadabhūt - āryo dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhāraṇīpratilabdhaḥ pañcābhijñaḥ pūrvajinakṛtādhikāraḥ mama saṃparigrāhakaḥ kalyāṇamitraṃ ca /
S06bsu049_u:10225: yannvahametamarthaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamabhigamyopasaṃkramya paripṛccheyam - kutaste tathāgatā āgatāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10226: kva vā te tathāgatā gatā iti //
S06bsu049_u:10227: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmodgate bodhisattve mahāsattve prema ca prasādaṃ ca citrīkāraṃ ca gauravaṃ ca upasthāpayati /
S06bsu049_u:10228: upasthāpya evaṃ prācintayat - kiyadrūpayā nu khalvahaṃ satkriyayā taṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkrāmeyam?
S06bsu049_u:10230_0: na ca me kiṃcittathārūpaṃ vastraṃ vā ratnaṃ vā suvarṇaṃ vā maṇayo vā muktā vā vaidūryaṃ
S06bsu049_u:10230_1: vā śaṅkhaśilā vā pravālaṃ vā rajataṃ vā puṣpaṃ vā dhūpo vā gandho vā mālyaṃ vā vilepanaṃ
S06bsu049_u:10230_2: vā cūrṇaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā chatraṃ vā dhvajaṃ vā ghaṇṭā vā patākā vā saṃvidyate /
S06bsu049_u:10231: kenāhaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkuryāṃ gurukuryām?
S06bsu049_u:10235: na ca me prītirvā prāmodhaṃ votpadyate //
S06bsu049_u:10236: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃrūpairguṇairgauravamanasikārairgacchan anupūrveṇa anyataraṃ nagaramanuprāpto 'bhūt /
S06bsu049_u:10237: tatra tasyāntarāpaṇamadhyagatasya etadabhūt - yannvahamimamātmabhāvaṃ vikrīya tena mūlyena dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya satkāraṃ kuryām /
S06bsu049_u:10238: dīrgharātraṃ hi mamātmabhāvasahasrāṇi bhagnāni kṣīṇāni niruddhāni vikrītāni /
S06bsu049_u:10239: punaḥ punaraparimāṇe saṃsāre aparimāṇāni ca nirayaduḥkhāni mayā kāmahetoḥ kāmanidānamanubhūtāni /
S06bsu049_u:10240: na punarevaṃrūpāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kṛtaśa evaṃrūpāṇāṃ vā sattvānāṃ satkārāyeti /
S06bsu049_u:10241: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvontarāpaṇamadhyagataḥ śabdamanuśrāvayāmāsa,
S06bsu049_u:10245: atha khalu mārasya pāpīyasa etadabhūt - ayaṃ sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmakāmatayā yadyātmānaṃ vikrīya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya satkāraṃ kariṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:10246: [Vaidya_245] prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ ca pariprakṣyati - kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kṣipramanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariniṣpatsyate iti,
S06bsu049_u:10248: adhṛṣyaś ca bhaviṣyati māreṇa vā mārakāyikābhirvā devatābhiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10251: tāṃś ca mama viṣayādatikrāmayiṣyati anyāṃś ca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya /
S06bsu049_u:10253: atha khalu māraḥ pāpīyāṃstān brāhmaṇagṛhapatikāṃstathā pratyutthāpayāmāsa,
S06bsu049_u:10254: yathā te taṃ ghoṣaṃ nāśrauṣuḥ sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya - kaḥ puruṣeṇārthikaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10257: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yadā ātmanaḥ krāyakaṃ na labhate,
S06bsu049_u:10260: evaṃ cāvocat - aho batāsmākaṃ durlabdhā lābhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10261: ye vayamātmabhāvasyāpi krāyakaṃ na labhāmahe - yadvayamātmabhāvaṃ vikrīya dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkuryāmeti //
S06bsu049_u:10262_0: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - yannvahaṃ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ
S06bsu049_u:10262_1: mahāsattvaṃ tulayeyam - kiṃ nvayaṃ sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'dhyāśayapratipanna
S06bsu049_u:10263: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro māṇavakaveṣamabhinirmāya yena sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10265: upasaṃkramya sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - kiṃ tvaṃ kulaputra dīnadīnamanā utkaṇṭhitamānaso 'śrūṇi pravartayamānaḥ sthitaḥ?
S06bsu049_u:10268: taṃ māṇavakarūpī śakra āha - kasya punastvaṃ kulaputra arthāya ātmānaṃ vikretukāmaḥ?
S06bsu049_u:10269: sadāpraruditastamāha - ahaṃ māṇavaka dharmakāmatayā imamātmānaṃ vikrīya dharmapūjāṃ kartukāmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10274: yena taṃ vikrīya prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjāṃ kuryām,
S06bsu049_u:10275: āryaṃ ca dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkuryāmiti /
S06bsu049_u:10276: atha khalu māṇavakaḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - na khalu mama kulaputra puruṣeṇa kṛtyam /
S06bsu049_u:10277: api tu khalu punaḥ piturbhe yajño yaṣṭavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10281: atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaitadabhūt - lābhā me paramasulabdhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10282: pariniṣpannaṃ cātmabhāvaṃ jāne prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalye buddhadharmeṣu ca,
S06bsu049_u:10283: yanmayāyaṃ māṇavakaḥ krāyako labdhaḥ hṛdayasya rudhirasya ca asthimajjāyāśceti /
S06bsu049_u:10284: sa hṛṣṭacittaḥ kalyacittaḥ pramuditacittastaṃ māṇavakametadavocat - dāsyāmi māṇavaka yena yenaiva te iti ātmabhāvādarthaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10285: sa tametadavocat - kiṃ te kulaputra mūlyaṃ dadāmi?
S06bsu049_u:10286: sa tametadavocat - yatte māṇavaka parityaktam, taddehīti /
S06bsu049_u:10287: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ viddhvā lohitaṃ niḥsrāvayati sma /
S06bsu049_u:10288: dakṣiṇaṃ coruṃ viddhvā nirmāṃsaṃ kṛtvā asthi bhettuṃ kuḍyamūlamupasaṃkrāmati sma /
S06bsu049_u:10290: sā adrākṣītsadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ bāhuṃ viddhvā rudhiraṃ niḥsrāvya ūruṃ nirmāṃsaṃ kṛtvā asthi bhettuṃ kuḍyamūlamupasaṃkrāntam /
S06bsu049_u:10291: tasyā etadabhūt - kiṃ nu khalvayaṃ kulaputra ātmanaivātmanaḥ īdṛśīṃ kāraṇāṃ kārayati?
S06bsu049_u:10293: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā yena sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastenopasaṃkrāntā /
S06bsu049_u:10294: upasaṃkramya sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - kiṃ nu khalu tvaṃ kulaputra evaṃrūpāmātmanaḥ prāṇahāriṇīṃ kāraṇāṃ kārayasi?
S06bsu049_u:10295: kiṃ cānena rudhireṇa kariṣyasi tvamasthimajjābhyāṃ ca?
S06bsu049_u:10296: sadāprarudita āha - asya dārike māṇavakasyāntike idaṃ vikrīya prajñāpāramitāṃ pūjayiṣyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:10297: āryaṃ ca dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkariṣyāmi //
S06bsu049_u:10298: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvatadavocat - kā punaste kulaputra tato guṇajātirniṣpatsyate guṇaviśeṣo vā,
S06bsu049_u:10299: yattvamātmano hṛdayaṃ rudhiraṃ cāsthimajjānaṃ ca vikrīya taṃ kulaputraṃ satkartukāmaḥ?
S06bsu049_u:10300: sa tāṃ dārikāmetadavocat - sa dārike kulaputro 'smākaṃ prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ copadekṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:10302: tatra vayaṃ śikṣamāṇāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyāmaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10303: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya suvarṇavarṇaṃ ca kāyaṃ pratilapsyāmahe /
S06bsu049_u:10304: dvātriṃśacca mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni aśītiṃ cānuvyañjanāni vyāmaprabhatāṃ ca anantaraśmitāṃ ca mahāmaitrī ca mahākaruṇāṃ ca mahāmuditāṃ ca mahopekṣāṃ ca /
S06bsu049_u:10315: yena ca sarvasattvānāṃ saṃvibhāgaṃ kariṣyāma iti //
S06bsu049_u:10316: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - āścaryaṃ kulaputra yāvadudārāḥ praṇītāścāmī tvayā dharmāḥ parikīrtitāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10317: ekaikasyāpi tāvatkulaputra evaṃrūpasya dharmasyārthāya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān api kalpānātmabhāvāḥ parityaktavyā bhaveyuḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10321: api nu khalu punaḥ kulaputra yena yenaivārthena te kṛtyam,
S06bsu049_u:10322_0: tattatte dāsyāmi suvarṇaṃ vā maṇīn vā muktāṃ vā rajataṃ vā vaidūryaṃ vā musāragalvaṃ
S06bsu049_u:10322_1: vā lohitārkaṃ vā sphāṭikaṃ vā puṣpaṃ vā dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā mālyaṃ va vilepanaṃ
S06bsu049_u:10322_2: vā cūrṇaṃ vā vastraṃ vā chatraṃ vā dhvajaṃ vā ghaṇṭāṃ vā patākāṃ vā dīpaṃ vā /
S06bsu049_u:10323: tena tvaṃ taṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkariṣyasi /
S06bsu049_u:10324: mā ca ātmana imāmevaṃrūpāṃ kāraṇāṃ kārṣīḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10329: [Vaidya_247] atha khalu śakro devānāmindro māṇavakaveṣamantardhāpayitvā svakenātmabhāvena sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purato 'sthāt,
S06bsu049_u:10332_0: evaṃrūpayā ca dharmārthikatayā pūrvakair api tathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ
S06bsu049_u:10332_1: pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caradbhiḥ prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ ca paripṛcchadbhiranuttarā
S06bsu049_u:10337: api tu khalu punarahaṃ tvāmeva mīmāṃsitukāma ihāgataḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10340: sa tāmāha - anuttarān me śakra buddhadharmān dehīti /
S06bsu049_u:10341: devendra āha - na mamātra kulaputra viṣaye viṣayitā /
S06bsu049_u:10344: sadāprarudita āha - alpotsukastvaṃ devendra bhava atra sthāne mamātmabhāvaparipūrimupādāya /
S06bsu049_u:10348: tena devendra satyena satyavacanena mama yathāpaurāṇo 'yamātmabhāvo bhavatu /
S06bsu049_u:10349: atha khalu tatkṣaṇaṃ tallavaṃ tanmuhūrtaṃ sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya buddhānubhāvena āśayapariśuddhyā ca yathāpaurāṇo 'sya kāyaḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt,
S06bsu049_u:10351: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro māraś ca pāpīyān niṣpratibhānaḥ sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyottare pratibhānamapratipadyamānastatraivāntarhito 'bhūt //
S06bsu049_u:10352: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - ehi tvaṃ kulaputra /
S06bsu049_u:10357: taṃ cāryaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkariṣyasi,
S06bsu049_u:10359: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sārdhaṃ tayā śreṣṭhadārikayā yenāsyāḥ svakaṃ niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmati sma /
S06bsu049_u:10361_0: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā svakaṃ niveśanaṃ praviśya svāṃ mātaraṃ pitaraṃ caitadavocat
S06bsu049_u:10361_1: - amba tāta daddhvaṃ hiraṇyaṃ suvarṇaṃ ratnāni maṇīn vastrāṇi puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10363: mām api sārdhamebhiḥ pañcabhirdārikāśatairyā mamopasthāyikā yuṣmabhireva dattāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10364: gamiṣyāmyaham api sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdhaṃ dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntikaṃ tasya pūjārthaṃ ca /
S06bsu049_u:10367: atha khalu tau tasyā dārikāyā mātāpitarau tāṃ dārikāmetadavocatām - kaḥ punareṣa dārike sadāprarudito nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10370: eṣa ca kulaputro 'dhyāśayena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhuṃ saṃprasthitaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10373: āryaṃ ca dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkartukāmaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10375: alabhamānaḥ san duḥkhito durmanāḥ pradhyāyan dīnamanā aśrūṇi pravartayamānaḥ sthitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10376: sa śakreṇa devānāmindreṇa māṇavakarūpamabhinirmāyoktaḥ - kiṃ tvaṃ kulaputra duḥkhī durmanāḥ pradhyāyan dīnamānaso 'śrūṇi pravartayamānaḥ sthita iti?
S06bsu049_u:10379: māṇavakarūpī śakrastamāha - kasya punastvaṃ kulaputra arthāyātmānaṃ vikretukāmaḥ?
S06bsu049_u:10381: āryaṃ ca dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkariṣyāmi yaduta dharmakāmatayā /
S06bsu049_u:10382: tatra pratibaddhāś ca me buddhadharmā iti /
S06bsu049_u:10383: māṇavakarūpī śakrastamāha - na mama kulaputra tvayārthaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10384: api tu khalu punaḥ piturme yajño bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:10385: tatra me puruṣasya hṛdayena rūdhireṇa asthimajjābhyāṃ ca kṛtyamiti /
S06bsu049_u:10387: sa tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā ātmano bāhuṃ viddhvā lohitaṃ niḥsrāvya ūruṃ ca nirmāṃsaṃ kṛtvā asthi bhettuṃ kuḍyamūlamupasaṃkrāntaḥ ekānte sthitvā asthi bhittvā majjānaṃ ca dāsyāmīti /
S06bsu049_u:10389: tasyā mamaitadabhūt - kiṃ nu khalvayaṃ puruṣa ātmanaivātmana evaṃrūpāṃ kāraṇāṃ kārayatīti?
S06bsu049_u:10390: tamenamahamupasaṃkramyaivamavocam - kimarthaṃ tvayā kulaputra ātmanaivātmana evaṃ kṣaradrūdhiraṃ śarīraṃ vikṛtaṃ kṛtam?
S06bsu049_u:10391: tata eṣa māmevamāha - asya dārike māṇavakasya lohitaṃ hṛdayamasthi majjānaṃ ca dāsyāmīti /
S06bsu049_u:10395: tamenamahamevamavocam - kiṃ punastvaṃ tena dhanena kariṣyasīti?
S06bsu049_u:10397: taṃ cāryaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkariṣyāmi yaduta dharmakāmatayeti /
S06bsu049_u:10398: tamenamahamevamavocam - kā punaste kulaputra tato guṇajātirbhaviṣyati guṇaviśeṣo veti?
S06bsu049_u:10399: tataḥ so 'cintyān me buddhaguṇān varṇayati saṃprakāśayati,
S06bsu049_u:10400: aprameyāṃś ca buddhadharmān - eṣāmevaṃrūpāṇāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ me tata āgamo bhaviṣyatīti /
S06bsu049_u:10401: tasya me mahattaraṃ prītiprāmodyamutpannaṃ tānacintyān buddhaguṇān śrutvā /
S06bsu049_u:10402: evaṃ ca me 'bhūt - āścaryaṃ yāvadduṣkarakārakaścāyaṃ kulaputro 'tīva dharmakāmaśca,
S06bsu049_u:10404: ayaṃ hi nāma kulaputro dharmakāmatayā ātmānaṃ parityajati /
S06bsu049_u:10406: evaṃrūpeṣu ca sthāneṣu praṇidhānaṃ na kartavyaṃ syāt,
S06bsu049_u:10407: yeṣāmasmākaṃ prabhūtā vipulāś ca bhogāḥ saṃvidyante iti /
S06bsu049_u:10408: sāhamenaṃ kulaputrametadavocam - mā mā tvaṃ kulaputra imāmevaṃrūpāmātmanaḥ prāṇahāriṇīṃ kāraṇāṃ kārṣīḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10409: ahaṃ te prabhūtaprabhūtaṃ dhanamanupradāpayiṣyāmi yena tavārthaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10410: tena tvaṃ tamāryaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkariṣyasi gurukariṣyasi /
S06bsu049_u:10411: aham api tvayaiva sārdhaṃ yena dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tenopasaṃkramiṣyāmi /
S06bsu049_u:10412: aham api tasya kulaputrasya pūjāṃ kariṣyāmi /
S06bsu049_u:10413: vayamapyevaṃrūpān dharmānniṣpādayiṣyāmo yaduta anuttarān buddhadharmān ye tvayā parikīrtitā iti /
S06bsu049_u:10416: yenāhametenaiva kulaputreṇa sārdhaṃ gatvā āryaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ pūjayiṣyāmi //
S06bsu049_u:10417: [Vaidya_249] atha khalu tau tasyā dārikāyā mātāpitarau tāṃ dārikāmetadavocatām - āścaryaṃ yāvadduṣkaraṃ ca tvametasya kulaputrasya sthānamācakṣe /
S06bsu049_u:10423: yadāvām api gacchāvastvayaiva sārdhaṃ taṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ draṣṭuṃ vandituṃ paryupāsituṃ pūjayituṃ ca //
S06bsu049_u:10424: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pūjārthaṃ satkārārthaṃ ca prasthitāṃ svāṃ mātaraṃ pitaraṃ ca viditvā etadavocat - amba tāta evaṃ kuruta,
S06bsu049_u:10427: ityuktvā evaṃ sā śreṣṭhidārikā dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pūjārthaṃ satkārārthaṃ ca prasthitā babhūva //
S06bsu049_u:10428: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā pañca rathaśatānyalaṃkārayāmāsa /
S06bsu049_u:10430_0: alaṃkṛtya nānāvarṇāni vicitrāṇi puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā nānāraṅgāṇi vastrāṇi puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākāś
S06bsu049_u:10430_1: ca gṛhītvā nānāratnāni ca vicitrāṇi nānāratnamayāni ca vicitrāṇi puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā
S06bsu049_u:10430_2: prabhūtaprabhūtaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ svādanīyaṃ ca gṛhītvā ekaṃ rathaṃ sadāpraruditena
S06bsu049_u:10430_3: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdhamabhiruhya taiḥ pañcabhī rathaśataiḥ pañcadārikāśatābhirūḍhaiḥ
S06bsu049_u:10430_4: parivṛttā puraskṛtā mahatā ca parivāreṇa mātāpitṛpūrvaṃgamā yena pūrvā dik tena prakrāntā /
S06bsu049_u:10431_0: anupūrveṇa ca gacchan sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'drākṣīddūrādeva tāṃ gandhavatīṃ
S06bsu049_u:10431_1: nagarīṃ saptānāṃ ratnānāṃ citrāṃ darśanīyāṃ saptabhiḥ prākāraiḥ saptaratnamayairanuparikṣiptāṃ
S06bsu049_u:10431_3: yojanāni vistāreṇa dvādaśa yojanānyāyāmena ṛddhāṃ sphītāṃ ca kṣemāṃ ca subhikṣāṃ
S06bsu049_u:10432_0: madhye ca nagaraśṛṅgāṭakasya adrākṣīddharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dharmāsanagatamanekaśatayā
S06bsu049_u:10432_1: parṣadā anekasahasrayā anekaśatasahasrayā parṣadā parivṛttaṃ puraskṛtaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantam /
S06bsu049_u:10433: sahadarśanenaiva ca tasya evaṃrūpaṃ sukhaṃ saṃpratilabhate sma tadyathāpi nāma prathamadhyānasamāpanno bhikṣurekāgreṇa manasikāreṇa /
S06bsu049_u:10434: dṛṣṭvā cāsya etadabhūt - na mama pratirūpametadbhavet,
S06bsu049_u:10435: yadahaṃ rathagata eva dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkrāmeyam /
S06bsu049_u:10438: tāny api pañca dārikāśatāni śreṣṭhidārikayā saha rathebhyo 'vateruḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10439_0: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śreṣṭhidārikāpūrvaṃgamaiḥ pañcabhirdārikāśataiḥ
S06bsu049_u:10439_1: parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto 'parimāṇapūjāvyūhena yena dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06bsu049_u:10440: tena khalu punaḥ samayena dharmodgatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kṛtaśaḥ saptaratnamayaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ kāritamabhūt lohitacandanālaṃkṛtaṃ muktājālaparikṣiptam /
S06bsu049_u:10444: yatra śuddhaṃ kṛṣṇāguru dhūpyate sma yaduta prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjārtham /
S06bsu049_u:10445: tasya ca kūṭāgārasya madhye saptaratnamayaḥ paryaṅkaḥ prajñapto 'bhūt /
S06bsu049_u:10447: yatra prajñāpāramitā prakṣiptā suvarṇapaṭṭeṣu likhitā vilīnena vaidūryeṇa /
S06bsu049_u:10449: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sārdhaṃ śreṣṭhidārikāpūrvaṃgamaiḥ pañcadārikāśataiḥ taṃ kūṭāgāramadrākṣīdaparimāṇena pūjāvyūhena pratimaṇḍitam /
S06bsu049_u:10451: śakraṃ ca devānāmindraṃ divyairmāndāravapuṣpairdivyaiścandanacūrṇairdivyaiś ca suvarṇacūrṇairdivyaiś ca rūpyacūrṇaistaṃ kūṭāgāramavakirantamabhyavakirantamabhiprakirantam /
S06bsu049_u:10453_0: dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat
S06bsu049_u:10453_1: - kimarthaṃ tvaṃ devendra anekairdevatāsahasraiḥ sārdhamidaṃ ratnamayaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ
S06bsu049_u:10454: imāni ca divyāni vādyāni devairuparyantarīkṣe pravāditāni?
S06bsu049_u:10455: evamukte śakro devānāmindraḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - na tvaṃ kulaputra jānīṣe?
S06bsu049_u:10456: eṣā hi sā prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mātā pariṇāyikā,
S06bsu049_u:10457: yatra śikṣamāṇā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvaguṇapāramitānugatān sarvabuddhadharmān sarvākārajñatāṃ ca kṣipramanuprāpnuvantīti /
S06bsu049_u:10458: evamukte sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - kvāsau kauśika prajñāpāramitā,
S06bsu049_u:10460_0: śakra āha - eṣā kulaputra asya kūṭāgārasya madhye suvarṇapaṭṭeṣu vilīnena vaidūryeṇa
S06bsu049_u:10460_1: likhitvā āryeṇa dharmodgatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena saptabhirmudrābhirmudrayitvā sthāpitā /
S06bsu049_u:10462: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sārdhaṃ śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhai pañcabhirdārikāśataiḥ samagrībhūtaiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10463: yānyanena puṣpāṇi gṛhītāni mālyadāmāni ca vastraratnāni ca dhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākāś ca suvarṇarūpyamayāni ca puṣpāṇi,
S06bsu049_u:10465: anyatarānyataraṃ ca tataḥ pratyaṃśaṃ sthāpayāmāsuḥ yaduta dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya satkārāya //
S06bsu049_u:10466_0: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni ca śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañca
S06bsu049_u:10466_2: ca puṣpairdivyaiś ca vādyaiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ pūrvaṃ pūjayitvā yena dharmodgato bodhisattvo
S06bsu049_u:10467: divyāni ca vādyāni saṃpravādayati sma dharmapūjāmevopādāya //
S06bsu049_u:10468: atha khalu tāni puṣpāṇi dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopariṣṭānmūrdhni puṣpakūṭāgāraṃ prātiṣṭhan /
S06bsu049_u:10469: tāni ca nānāvarṇāni puṣpāṇi suvarṇarūpyamayāni ca puṣpāṇi [Vaidya_251] vihāyasi vitānamiva sthitāni /
S06bsu049_u:10470: tāny api cīvarāṇi vastraratnāni ca antarīkṣe nānāratnamayo 'bhramaṇḍapa iva saṃsthito 'bhūt /
S06bsu049_u:10471: adrākṣītkhalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni ca pañca dārikāśatāni śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyedamevaṃrūpamṛddhiprātihāryam /
S06bsu049_u:10472: dṛṣṭvā ca punareṣāmetadabhūt - āścaryaṃ yāvanmaharddhikaścāyaṃ dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvanmahānubhāvo yāvanmahaujaskaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10475_0: atha khalu tāni śreṣṭhidārikāpūrvaṃgamāni pañca dārikāśatāni dharmodgate bodhisattve
S06bsu049_u:10475_1: mahāsattve spṛhāmutpādya sarvāstāḥ samagrībhūtā adhyāśayena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06bsu049_u:10476: evaṃ cāvocan - anena vayaṃ kuśalamūlena anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bhavema /
S06bsu049_u:10477: bodhisattvacaryāṃ ca vayaṃ carantya eteṣāmeva dharmāṇāṃ lābhinyo bhavema,
S06bsu049_u:10478: yeṣāṃ dharmāṇāmayaṃ dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo lābhī /
S06bsu049_u:10480: yathāyaṃ dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ satkaroti gurukaroti /
S06bsu049_u:10481: bahujanasya ca saṃprakāśayema yathāyaṃ dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃprakāśayati /
S06bsu049_u:10482: evameva ca prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca samanvāgatā bhavema /
S06bsu049_u:10483: pariniṣpadyemahi ca yathāyaṃ dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca samanvāgataḥ pariniṣpannaś ca //
S06bsu049_u:10484_0: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni ca śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañca
S06bsu049_u:10484_1: dārikāśatāni prajñāpāramitāṃ pūjayitvā dharmodgataṃ ca bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkṛtya
S06bsu049_u:10484_2: dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte sagauravāḥ
S06bsu049_u:10485_0: ekānte sthitaś ca sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ
S06bsu049_u:10485_1: mahāsattvametadavocat - ihāhaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ gaveṣamāṇo 'raṇyagato nirghoṣamaśrauṣam
S06bsu049_u:10487: so 'haṃ samyak taṃ nirghoṣaṃ śrutvā yena pūrvā dik tena saṃprasthitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10488: tasya me etadabhūt - samyak ca mayā nirghoṣaḥ śrutaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10489: na ca mayā sa nirghoṣaḥ paripṛṣṭaḥ - kiyaddūraṃ mayā gantavyam,
S06bsu049_u:10490: kasya vā antikātprajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyāmi lapsye veti /
S06bsu049_u:10492: so 'haṃ tena daurmanasyena mahatīmutkaṇṭhāṃ paritapanaṃ cāpanno 'bhūvam /
S06bsu049_u:10495: api tu prajñāpāramitāmeva manasi karomi - kiyaddūraṃ mayā gantavyam,
S06bsu049_u:10497: na ca mayā sa nirghoṣaḥ paripṛṣṭaḥ iti /
S06bsu049_u:10499: sa māmevamāha - gaccha kulaputra itaḥ pañcabhiryojanaśatairanupūrveṇa gandhavatī nāma nagarī /
S06bsu049_u:10500: tatra drakṣyasi dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ deśayantaṃ prakāśayantamiti /
S06bsu049_u:10502: so 'haṃ tenaiva mahatodāreṇa prītiprāmodyena sphuṭastataḥ pṛthivīpradeśānna calitaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10504: tasya me śṛṇvato bahūni samādhimukhāni prādurbhūtāni /
S06bsu049_u:10505: [Vaidya_252] tatra sthitaṃ māṃ daśadiglokadhātusthitā buddhā bhagavantaḥ samāśvāsayanti,
S06bsu049_u:10506: sādhukāraṃ ca dadati - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S06bsu049_u:10509: te māṃ tathāgatāḥ sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya antarhitāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10511: tasya me etadabhūt - kuto nu te tathāgatā āgatāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10512: kva vā te tathāgatā gatā iti?
S06bsu049_u:10513: tasya ca me etadabhūt - āryo dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhāraṇīpratilabdhaḥ pañcābhijñaḥ pūrvajinākṛtādhikāro 'varopitakuśalamūlaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10516: yataste tathāgatā āgatā yatra vā te tathāgatā gatā iti /
S06bsu049_u:10517: so 'haṃ tasya tathāgatavigrahasya nirghoṣaṃ śrutvā yathānuśiṣṭaṃ yena pūrvāṃ dik tena saṃprasthitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10521: so 'haṃ tvāṃ kulaputra pṛcchāmi - kutaste tathāgatā āgatāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10523: deśaya me kulaputra teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ gamanaṃ ca /
S06bsu049_u:10524: yathā vayaṃ teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ gamanaṃ ca jānīma,
S06bsu049_u:10530: evamukte dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattva mahāsattvametadavocat - na khalu kulaputra tathāgatāḥ kutaścidāgacchanti vā gacchanti vā /
S06bsu049_u:10534: na hi kulaputra anutpāda āgacchati vā gacchati vā /
S06bsu049_u:10537: na hi kulaputra bhūtakoṭyā āgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
S06bsu049_u:10540: na hi kulaputra śūnyatāyā āgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
S06bsu049_u:10543: na hi kulaputra yathāvattāyā āgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
S06bsu049_u:10546: na hi kulaputra virāgasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
S06bsu049_u:10549: na hi kulaputra nirodhasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
S06bsu049_u:10552: na hi kulaputra ākāśadhātorāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
S06bsu049_u:10555: na hi kulaputra anyatra ebhyo dharmebhyastathāgataḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10556: yā ca kulaputra eṣāmeva dharmāṇāṃ tathatā,
S06bsu049_u:10564: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra puruṣo grīṣmābhitapto grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse 'bhigate madhyāhnakālasamaye marīcikāṃ paśyet syandamānām /
S06bsu049_u:10565: sa tena tena pradhāvet - atrodakaṃ pāsyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:10567: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra kuta etadudakamāgataṃ kva vā tadudakaṃ gacchati,
S06bsu049_u:10568: pūrvaṃ vā mahāsamudraṃ dakṣiṇaṃ vā paścimaṃ vā uttaraṃ vā?
S06bsu049_u:10569: sadāprarudita āha - na hi kulaputra marīcikāyāmudakaṃ saṃvidyate /
S06bsu049_u:10570: kiṃ punarasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate?
S06bsu049_u:10571: sa khalu punaḥ kulaputra puruṣo grīṣmābhitapto bālajātīyo duṣprajñajātīyo marīcikāṃ dṛṣṭvā anudake udakasaṃjñāmutpādayati /
S06bsu049_u:10574: evameva kulaputra ye kecittathāgatarūpeṇa vā ghoṣeṇa vā abhiniviṣṭāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10575: te tathāgatasyāgamanaṃ ca gamanaṃ ca kalpayanti /
S06bsu049_u:10576: ye ca tathāgatasyāgamanaṃ ca gamanaṃ ca kalpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:10577: sarve te bālajātīyā duṣprajñajātīyā iti vaktavyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10578: tadyathāpi nāma sa eva puruṣo yo 'nudake udakasaṃjñāmutpādayati /
S06bsu049_u:10582: na ca kulaputra dharmatā āgacchati vā gacchati vā /
S06bsu049_u:10583: evameva kulaputra nāsti tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā /
S06bsu049_u:10584: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra māyākāranirmitasya hastikāyasya vā aśvakāyasya vā rathakāyasya vā pattikāyasya vā nāstyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā,
S06bsu049_u:10585: evameva kulaputra nāsti tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā /
S06bsu049_u:10586: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntaragata ekaṃ vā tathāgataṃ paśyet,
S06bsu049_u:10587: dvau vā trīn vā caturo vā pañca vā ṣaḍvā sapta vā aṣṭau vā nava vā daśa vā viṃśatiṃ vā triṃśadvā catvāriṃśadvā pañcāśadvā śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā,
S06bsu049_u:10589: sa prativibuddhaḥ san ekam api tathāgataṃ na paśyet /
S06bsu049_u:10590: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra kutaste tathāgatā āgatāḥ kva vā te tathāgatā gatā iti?
S06bsu049_u:10591: sadāprarudita āha - na khalu punaḥ kulaputra svapne kasyaciddharmasya [Vaidya_254] pariniṣpattiḥ prajñāyate /
S06bsu049_u:10593: dharmodgata āha - evameva kulaputra sarvadharmāḥ svapnopamā uktā bhagavatā /
S06bsu049_u:10594: ye kecitkulaputra svapnopamān sarvadharmāṃstathāgatena nirdeśitān yathābhūtaṃ na prajānanti,
S06bsu049_u:10595: te tathāgatān nāmakāyena vā rūpakāyena vā abhiniviśya tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā kalpayanti /
S06bsu049_u:10596: yathāpi nāma dharmatāmaprajānanto ye ca tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā kalpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:10602: ye khalu punaḥ kulaputra svapnopamān sarvadharmān svapnopamāḥ sarvadharmā iti tathāgatena deśitān yathābhūtaṃ prajānanti,
S06bsu049_u:10603: na te kasyaciddharmasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā kalpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:10605: ye ca na kasyaciddharmasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā kalpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:10609: na te tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā kalpayanti /
S06bsu049_u:10613: te ca bhagavataḥ śrāvakāḥ amoghaṃ rāṣṭrapiṇḍaṃ paribhuñjate /
S06bsu049_u:10615: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra mahāsamudre ratnāni na pūrvasyā diśa āgacchanti,
S06bsu049_u:10619: na vidigbhyo nādhastānnopariṣṭānna kutaściddeśebhyo digbhya āgacchanti,
S06bsu049_u:10620: api tu khalu punaḥ sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlānyupādāya mahāsamudre ratnānyutpadyante /
S06bsu049_u:10623: nirudhyamānāni ca tāni ratnāni ca kvaciddaśadiśi loke saṃkrāmanti /
S06bsu049_u:10624: api tu khalu punaryeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ satāṃ tāni ratnāni prabhāvyante,
S06bsu049_u:10625: teṣāṃ pratyayānāmasatāṃ na teṣāṃ ratnānāṃ prabhāvanā bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:10626: evameva kulaputra teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ kāyapariniṣpattirna kutaściddaśadiśi lokādāgatā,
S06bsu049_u:10628: na ca ahetuko buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ kāyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10631: api tu khalu punaryeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ satāṃ kāyābhiniṣpattirbhavati,
S06bsu049_u:10633: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra vīṇāyāḥ śabda utpadyamāno na kutaścidāgacchati,
S06bsu049_u:10637_0: tadyathāpi nāma droṇīṃ ca pratītya carma ca pratītya tantrīś ca pratītya daṇḍaṃ ca
S06bsu049_u:10637_1: pratītya upadhānīś ca pratītya koṇaṃ ca pratītya puruṣasya ca tajjavyāyāmaṃ pratītya
S06bsu049_u:10637_2: evamayaṃ vīṇāyāḥ śabdo niścarati hetvadhīnaḥ pratyayādhīnaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10638: sa ca śabdo na droṇyā niścarati,
S06bsu049_u:10639: na carmaṇo na tantrībhyo na daṇḍānnopadhānībhyo na koṇānna puruṣasya tajjavyāyāmataḥ śabdo niścarati,
S06bsu049_u:10640: api tu khalu punaḥ sarveṣāṃ samāyogācchabdaḥ prajñapyate /
S06bsu049_u:10642: evameva kulaputra buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ kāyaniṣpattirhetvadhīnā pratyayādhīnā anekakuśalamūlaprayogapariniṣpannā ca /
S06bsu049_u:10643: na caikato hetuto na caikataḥ pratyayato na caikataḥ kuśalamūlato buddhakāyaprabhāvanā /
S06bsu049_u:10647: evaṃ tvayā kulaputra teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ ca gamanaṃ ca draṣṭavyam /
S06bsu049_u:10650: yataḥ kulaputra tvamevaṃ tathāgatāṃś ca sarvadharmāṃś ca anutpannānaniruddhāṃś ca saṃprajñāsyasi,
S06bsu049_u:10653: asmin khalu punastathāgatānāmanāgatyagamananirdeśe bhāṣyamāṇe mahān bhūmicālo 'bhūt /
S06bsu049_u:10654: sarvaś ca trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāramahādaśamahānimittaṃ kampate prakampate saṃprakampate,
S06bsu049_u:10660: sarvāṇi ca mārabhavanāni saṃkṣobhitāni jihmībhūtāni cābhūvan /
S06bsu049_u:10662: te sarve yena dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvastena praṇatā abhūvan /
S06bsu049_u:10665: śakraś ca devānāmindraścatvāraś ca mahārājāno dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ divyaiścandanacūrṇairdivyaiś ca puṣpairavākiran abhyavākiran abhiprākiran /
S06bsu049_u:10666: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣanta - sādhu sādhu kulaputra /
S06bsu049_u:10667: tava kulaputra anubhāvena adyāsmābhiḥ paramārthanirjātā kathā deśyamānā śrutā sarvalokavipratyanīkā,
S06bsu049_u:10669: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - kaḥ punaḥ kulaputra atra hetuḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10670: kaḥ pratyayo 'sya mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya loke prādurbhāvāya?
S06bsu049_u:10671_0: dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva āha - imaṃ kulaputra tathāgatānāmanāgatyagamananirdeśaṃ
S06bsu049_u:10671_1: tava ca pṛcchato mama ca nirdiśato 'ṣṭānāṃ prāṇisahasrāṇāmanutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilambho 'bhūt /
S06bsu049_u:10673: catuḥṣaṣṭeś ca prāṇisahasrāṇāṃ virajāṃsi vigatamalāni dharmeṣu dharmacakṣūṃṣi viśuddhāni //
S06bsu049_u:10674: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paramodāreṇa prītiprāmodyena samanvāgato 'bhūt - lābhā me paramasulabdhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10675: yasya me prajñāpāramitāmimaṃ ca tathāgatānāmanāgatyagamananirdeśaṃ paripṛcchataḥ iyatāṃ sattvānāmarthaḥ kṛtaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10676: etadevāsmākaṃ paryāptaṃ kuśalaṃ bhavedanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ pariniṣpattaye /
S06bsu049_u:10677: na ca me bhūyo vicikitsā pravartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10679_0: sa tenaiva prītiprāmodyena samanvāgataḥ saptatālaṃ vihāyasamabhyudgamya saptatāle
S06bsu049_u:10679_1: sthitvā evaṃ cintayati sma - kenāhametarhi antarīkṣe sthitaḥ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ
S06bsu049_u:10680: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamabhyudgataṃ dṛṣṭvā cetasaiva cāsya cittamājñāya divyāni cāsmai māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇyupanāmayati sma,
S06bsu049_u:10681: evaṃ cāvocat - ebhistvaṃ kulaputra divyaiḥ puṣpairdharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ [Vaidya_256] mahāsattvaṃ satkuru /
S06bsu049_u:10683: tava hi kulaputra anubhāvena adya bahūnāṃ prāṇisahasrāṇāmarthaḥ kṛtaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10685: ye sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśo 'prameyānasaṃkhyeyān kalpānutsahante mahāntaṃ bhāramudvoḍhuṃ yathā tvayā utsoḍham //
S06bsu049_u:10686: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śakrasya devānāmindrasyāntikānmāndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamavākirat,
S06bsu049_u:10689: svakena ca kāyena dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamabhicchādayati sma /
S06bsu049_u:10690: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣata - eṣo 'haṃ kulaputra adyāgreṇa tavātmānaṃ niryātayāmi upasthānaparicaryāyai /
S06bsu049_u:10691: sa ātmānaṃ niryātya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purataḥ prāñjaliṃ kṛtvāsthāt //
S06bsu049_u:10692: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā tāni ca pañca dārikāśatāni sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - etā vayam api kulaputra tavātmānaṃ niryātayāmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10693: vayamapyanena kuśalamūlena eteṣāmeva dharmāṇāṃ lābhinyo bhavema,
S06bsu049_u:10694: tvayaiva ca sārdhaṃ punaḥ punarbuddhāṃś ca bhagavato bodhisattvāṃś ca satkuryāma gurukuryāma /
S06bsu049_u:10696: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śreṣṭhidārikāṃ tāni ca pañca dārikāśatānyetadavocat - yadi me yūyaṃ dārikā adhyāśayamanuvartadhvam,
S06bsu049_u:10699: dārikā āhuḥ - anuvartiṣyāmahe tava vayamāśayenādhyāśayena ca /
S06bsu049_u:10701_0: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañca
S06bsu049_u:10701_1: dārikāśatāni sarvālaṃkārabhūṣitāni kṛtvā tāni ca pañca rathaśatānyalaṃkṛtya sarvāṇi
S06bsu049_u:10701_2: ca tāni dharmodgatāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya niryātayati sma upasthānaparicaryāyaiḥ
S06bsu049_u:10702: imāni ca pañca rathaśatāni niryātayāmi paribhogāyeti //
S06bsu049_u:10703: atha khalu śakro devānāmindrastasmai kulaputrāya sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu kulaputra /
S06bsu049_u:10705: evaṃrūpeṇa ca tyāgacittena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
S06bsu049_u:10706: evaṃ ca dharmabhāṇakāṇāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā śakyaṃ prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ ca śrotum /
S06bsu049_u:10707_0: tair api kulaputra paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ
S06bsu049_u:10707_1: caradbhirevaṃrūpa eva tyāge sthitvā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ samudānītā prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ
S06bsu049_u:10708_0: atha khalu dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañca
S06bsu049_u:10708_1: dārikāśatāni pañca rathaśatāni sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kuśalaparipūrimupādāya pratigṛhṇīte sma /
S06bsu049_u:10710: atha khalu dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanāt svakaṃ gṛhaṃ prāvikṣat sūryasya cāstaṃgamanakālo 'bhūt //
S06bsu049_u:10711: atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaitadabhūt - naitanmama sādhu pratirūpaṃ bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:10714: yannvahaṃ dvābhyāmeva [Vaidya_257] īryāpathābhyāṃ sthitvā sthānena caṃkrameṇa ca kālamatināmayeyam,
S06bsu049_u:10715: yāvaddharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svakādgṛhānnirgato bhaviṣyati yaduta dharmasaṃprakāśanāyeti //
S06bsu049_u:10716: atha khalu dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sapta varṣāṇyekasamādhisamāpanna evābhūt /
S06bsu049_u:10718: sadāprarudito 'pi bodhisattvo mahāsattva sapta varṣāṇi dvābhyāmeva īryāpathābhyāṃ kālamatināmayan na styānamiddhamavakrāmayāmāsa /
S06bsu049_u:10722: api tu kadā nāma dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'smātsamādhervyutthāsyati,
S06bsu049_u:10723: yannu vayaṃ dharmodgatasya bodhisattva mahāsattvasya dharmāsanaṃ prajñapayiṣyāmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10725: taṃ ca pṛthivīpradeśaṃ susiktaṃ sumṛṣṭaṃ ca kariṣyāmo nānāpuṣpābhikīrṇam,
S06bsu049_u:10726: yatra pṛthivīpradeśe dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ ca saṃprakāśayiṣyatīti cintayāmāsa /
S06bsu049_u:10727_0: tāny api śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañca dārikāśatāni sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya
S06bsu049_u:10728: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divyaṃ nirghoṣamaśrauṣīt - itaḥ saptame divase dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'smātsamādhervyutthāsyati,
S06bsu049_u:10729: vyutthāya ca madhyenagarasya niṣadya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyatīti /
S06bsu049_u:10730_0: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ divyaṃ nirghoṣaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭa
S06bsu049_u:10730_1: udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātastaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ śodhayāmāsa sārdhaṃ
S06bsu049_u:10732: svakaṃ cottarāsaṅgaṃ kāyādavatārya tasyāsanasyopari prajñapayati sma /
S06bsu049_u:10733_0: atha khalu tā dārikāḥ svakasvakānuttarāsaṅgān kāyādavatārya pañcottarāsaṅgaśatāni
S06bsu049_u:10733_1: tatrāsane prajñapayāmāsuḥ atrāsane dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niṣadya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyatīti /
S06bsu049_u:10734: evaṃ tāś ca sarvā dārikā dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmāsanamāstīrya tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanasaḥ pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasya jātā abhūvan //
S06bsu049_u:10735: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ sektukāmaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10739: apyeva nāma asya sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyodakamalabhamānasya cittaṃ khidyeta,
S06bsu049_u:10744: atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaitadabhūt - yannvahamātmanaḥ kāyaṃ viddhvā imaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ rudhireṇa siñceyam /
S06bsu049_u:10747: mā rajodhāturito bhūpradeśāddharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kāye nipatet /
S06bsu049_u:10749: varaṃ khalu punarmamāyaṃ kāya [Vaidya_258] evaṃrūpayā kriyayā vinaśyatu,
S06bsu049_u:10751: api ca kāmahetoḥ kāmanidānaṃ bahūni me ātmabhāvasahasrāṇi punaḥ punaḥ saṃsāre saṃsarato bhinnāni,
S06bsu049_u:10755: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti pratisaṃkhyāya tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā svakāyaṃ samantato viddhvā taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ svarudhireṇa sarvamasiñcat /
S06bsu049_u:10756_0: tāny api śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañcadārikāśatāni sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya
S06bsu049_u:10756_1: mahāsattvasyānuśikṣamāṇāni sarvāṇi tāni tīkṣṇāni śastrāṇi gṛhītvā svakasvakāni śarīrāṇi
S06bsu049_u:10757: na ca sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tāsāṃ vā sarvāsāṃ dārikāṇāṃ cittasyānyathātvamabhūt,
S06bsu049_u:10758: yatra sa māraḥ pāpīyānavatāraṃ labhet kuśalamūlāntarāyakaraṇāya //
S06bsu049_u:10759: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - āścaryaṃ yāvaddharmakāmaścāyaṃ sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10760: yāvaddṛḍhasamādānaś ca yāvanmahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhaś ca anapekṣaḥ kāye jīviteṣu bhogeṣu ca,
S06bsu049_u:10763: atha khalu śakro devānāmindrastatsarvaṃ lohitodakaṃ divyaṃ candanodakamadhyatiṣṭhat,
S06bsu049_u:10764: samantācca tasya pṛthivīpradeśasya acintyaṃ paramodāraṃ gandhaṃ yasya divyasya candanodakasya paripūrṇam /
S06bsu049_u:10766: atha śakro devānāmindraḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kulaputra /
S06bsu049_u:10768: sādhvī ca te anuttarā dharmakāmatā dharmaparīṣṭiś ca /
S06bsu049_u:10769: evaṃrūpeṇa kulaputra adhyāśayena evaṃrūpeṇa vīryeṇa evaṃrūpayā ca dharmakāmatayā taiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ samudānītā //
S06bsu049_u:10770: atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaitadabhūt - prajñaptaṃ mayā dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmāsanam /
S06bsu049_u:10771: ayaṃ ca pṛthivīpradeśaḥ susiktaḥ susaṃmṛṣṭaś ca kṛtaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10774: dharmodgataṃ ca bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ dharmāsane niṣaṇṇamabhyavakireyam?
S06bsu049_u:10775: atha khalu śakro devānāmindraḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - imāni te kulaputra pratigṛhāṇa divyāni māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi /
S06bsu049_u:10777: dharmodgataṃ ca bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ dharmāsane niṣaṇṇamabhyavakira /
S06bsu049_u:10778: sa tasmai divyaṃ khārīsahasraṃ divyānāṃ māndāravapuṣpāṇāmupanāmayati sma /
S06bsu049_u:10779: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā anyataraiḥ puṣpaistaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ puṣpābhikīrṇamakārṣīt,
S06bsu049_u:10781: atha khalu dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saptānāṃ varṣāṇāmatyayena tataḥ samādhervyutthāya yena dharmāsanaṃ tenopasaṃkramya prajñapta evāsane nyaṣīdat,
S06bsu049_u:10782: anekaśatasahasrayā parṣadā parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ deśayāmāsa //
S06bsu049_u:10783: [Vaidya_259] atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sahadarśanenaiva dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tādṛśaṃ sukhaṃ pratilabhate sma,
S06bsu049_u:10785: tatreyaṃ dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitādeśanāyaduta sarvadharmasamatayā prajñāpāramitāsamatā /
